font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The most spectacular\nmonument in India would have been the 3100 year old Marthanda sun temple of\nKashmir, if it had NOT been destroyed by the 7th invader Muslim king of Kashmir\n, Sikandar Butshikan, out of sheer jealousy.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Taj Mahal would have been nowhere.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It took Sikander Butshikan\u2019s\nsoldiers 13 months to destroy this glorious temple . Such was its amazing\nstrength with huge interlocking stones. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Cruel and blood thirsty Muslim invader king Sikander\nButshikan, &nbsp;the second Sultan of the\nSwati Afghan Shah Miri dynasty of Kashmir ( 1389\u20131413 AD ) was an ethnic\ncleanser who was the first on this planet to be guilty of a true holocaust. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His cousins were ruling Afghanistan and the\nWestern part of Pakistan. They had been ruling Kabul lagmant and Swat in\n1190\u20131520, and are known as Jahangiri dynasty in history.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; ( Wiki leaks ) and that Hindus are biggest threat to India -- big mistake. &nbsp;He lost all goodwill !!.</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thank god it is the\nInternet era.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>THE UNQUANTIFIED HOLOCAUST AND GENOCIDE &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Akshardham temple is in\nNew Delhi, India. There is a sister temple in Gandhidham Gujarat. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Islamic extremists\ntried to destroy this temple on 24<sup>th</sup> Sept 2002 out of sheer jealousy.\n&nbsp;&nbsp;They\nfailed to do it, and all they could do was to kill 32 persons including women\nand children , and injuring more than 80. &nbsp;The extremists were shot dead by Indian\ncommandos. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mqORpWZa0z8/UW1nUYSqFUI/AAAAAAAAhpY/atN27D4kae8/s1600/llll.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This temple uses no steel\nor concrete. &nbsp;It has more than 20,000 intricately\ncarved murtis or idols. &nbsp;The Narayan\nSarovar is a lake that surrounds the main monument. &nbsp;The lake contains holy waters from 151 rivers of\nIndia and lakes which included lake &nbsp;Mansarovar near Mount Kailash. .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And like a\nnecklace around the monument is the parikarma, the double-storied colonnade\nwhich is nearly 2 kms long and has 1,660 pillars. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adding beauty is the\nYagnapurush Kund, a pool with 2,870 steps and 108 small shrines. There are more\nthan 100 acres with beautiful gardens, water fountains and carved pavilions.</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Akshardham experience is an enlightening journey through India\u2019s glorious\nart and values.</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 17 December 2007,\nMichael Whitty, an official world record adjudicator for Guinness World\nRecords, came skippety skip -- nay-- hoppety hop , to India to present a new world record for the\nAkshardham temple complex. They are ignorant as there are several temples in\nIndia which are bigger and even grander.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Has anybody seen the\n1000 pillar hall of Madurai Meenakshi temple? &nbsp;See below.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qkl2CJO32OA/UW1ou_lbRZI/AAAAAAAAhp0/x2BQbPb5oz4/s1600/ARUNACHALA.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">Or the Ranganathaswamy Temple at Srirangam, Tamil Nadu ( below ), &nbsp;in 156 acres of land ?</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0uYZCpGENdo/UW1pCOUpfII/AAAAAAAAhp4/Ldc1CULN1D4/s1600/SRIRANGAM+2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeecc; color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>There are two paths in Hinduism.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeecc; color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: #eeeecc;\">One is the </span><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Advaita ( non-dual )</span><span style=\"background-color: #eeeecc;\"> and the other is </span><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Dwaita ( dual ) </span><span style=\"background-color: #eeeecc;\">philosophy of Sanatana Dharma.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeecc; color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: #eeeecc;\">The </span><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Advaita</span><span style=\"background-color: #eeeecc;\"> looks at God as brahmAn, the intelligent morphogenetic consciousness field &nbsp;-- the akasha , the space between the electrons in an atom. &nbsp;The electron is made to jump an orbit and everything changes.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeecc; color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-qSplZ80v_JE/UW4Dp2kEfpI/AAAAAAAAhqQ/yyeDFvKG--Q/s1600/nkhb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"310\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-qSplZ80v_JE/UW4Dp2kEfpI/AAAAAAAAhqQ/yyeDFvKG--Q/s320/nkhb.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeecc; color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeecc; color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: #eeeecc;\">The</span><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"> Dwaita form</span><span style=\"background-color: #eeeecc;\"> looks at God as the trinity of creator Brahma , preserver Vishnu and destroyer Shiva also known as Tamas -Rajas- Sattwa. &nbsp; The modern world knows this as Yin-Yang . &nbsp;This is represented by the trident ( trishul) of Lord Shiva.</span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeecc; color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeecc; color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Examples:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeecc; color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Energy/ matter<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeecc; color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Particle/ wave<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeecc; color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Cathode/ anode<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeecc; color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Conscious/ subconscious<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeecc; color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Aerobic bacteria/ anaerobic<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeecc; color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Catabolism/ anabolism<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeecc; color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Potential energy/ kinetic energy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeecc; color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Attraction/ repulsion<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeecc; color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Excitation/ inhibition<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeecc; color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Birth/ decay<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeecc; color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Static / dynamic<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeecc; color: #333333; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Organic / inorganic<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #eeeecc; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Margaret Thatcher\nmorbid argued that sanctions against the apartheid regime of South Africa were\nimmoral because that would throw thousands of South African black people out of\nwork. Her morbid stance allowed Rothschild &nbsp;to continue milking apartheid South Africa, &nbsp;whose biggest trading partner and foreign\ninvestor was UK.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead of attributing\nviolence and deaths of blacks to an oppressive system, she attributed it to\nblacks themselves, which South Africa and the rest of Africa had in common\n(sic!).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These are ulcerated\nwounds which will be hard to heal. &nbsp;She\ndubbed ANC a terrorist organisation, and Nelson Mandela a terrorist, shocking\nthe civilized world. In the pre-Internet era, not many people knew about her\nMaster Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She morbidly argued\nthat the ANC would implement a communist system and give Russia a foothold in\nSouthern Africa. &nbsp;And then the whole of Africa\nwould fall like dominoes to Communism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Margaret Thatcher\u2019s\ndeath set off a flurry of tributes from around the world, &nbsp;but none from South Africa. &nbsp;Pallo Jordan, an ANC leader who was once\nexiled from his own country, told The Guardian \u201cGood riddance\u201d when asked about\nThatcher\u2019s death. That\u2019s because Thatcher, &nbsp;was a sole and supporter of apartheid, even\ngoing that far to call incarcerated Nelson Mandela a terrorist.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pallo Jordan, a former\nCabinet minister and stalwart of the ANC, said after hearing of her death \"Many\nlives were lost [as a result of the apartheid regime]. &nbsp;I don't think it's a great loss to the\nworld\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even conservative\nleader David Cameron has condemned Margaret Thatcher's policy on South Africa\nduring apartheid.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mr Cameron had\ndescribed Mandela as \"one of the greatest men alive\".</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the 1980s Lady\nThatcher caused world wide controversy when she refused to back sanctions\nagainst South Africa. &nbsp;In 1987 she said\nthat anyone who believed the ANC would ever rule South Africa was \"living\nin cloud-cuckoo land\".<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7hXYfJXDfPU/UWpLWcg7IpI/AAAAAAAAhf8/M29S8LVelZE/s1600/article_7e94f5ec4785ac9d_1356299035_9j-4aaqsk.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7hXYfJXDfPU/UWpLWcg7IpI/AAAAAAAAhf8/M29S8LVelZE/s400/article_7e94f5ec4785ac9d_1356299035_9j-4aaqsk.jpeg\" width=\"373\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She was against any\nactions to finish apartheid.\u201d \"When people are doing the right thing,\nboldly and courageously, as President de Klerk is, it seems quite absurd to\nstill use sticks to beat them with, however small those sticks may be\",\nher ill fitted dentures nearly popping out.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By the mid 1980s,\nThatcher was almost alone on the world stage in her opposition to sanctions. She\nwas firm like the rock of Gibralter in resisting international pressure to\nimpose economic sanctions on the former colony, where the United Kingdom (Rothschild\n) was the biggest foreign investor and principal trading partner. &nbsp;This meant that the status quo remained the\nsame, and her Master Rothschild continued to operate in South Africa. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the 1980s, when the\nsegregationist government imposed a state of emergency to suppress bloody\nanti-apartheid uprisings, Thatcher strongly opposed a drive within the\nCommonwealth to deepen sanctions against the white regime, arguing they would\n\"only harden attitudes\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Geoffrey\nHowe, one of her closest allies, Mrs Thatcher declared the ANC as a 'typical\nterrorist organisation', as late as 1987.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She also believed\nsanctions would disproportionately injure Britain ( read as Rothschild ) &nbsp;and neighbouring African countries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thatcher's opposition\nto economic sanctions was challenged by visiting anti-apartheid activists,\nincluding South African bishop Desmond Tutu, whom she met in London. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At a Commonwealth\nsummit in Nassau in October 1985 Margaret Thatcher finally agreed to impose\nlimited sanctions and to set up a contact group to promote a dialogue with Pretoria,\nafter she was firmly warned by Indian prime minister Rajiv Gandhi &nbsp;that her opposition threatened to break up the\n49-nation organization. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The last straw was when\nshe said in a ridiculous and pompous manner, that sanctions against the Rothschild\nsupported apartheid regime would hurt blacks more.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Zambia's former\npresident Kenneth Kaunda berated Thatcher bitterly at a 1986 Commonwealth\nconference where she refused to join six nations including Australia and Canada\nin imposing a package of sanctions against South Africa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kaunda told reporters\nThatcher cut a \"very pathetic picture indeed\" and accused her of\n\"worshipping gold, platinum and the rest\" on offer from South Africa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was a far cry from\nhis amused references to Thatcher as \"my dancing partner\" after the\ntwo famously waltzed at a 1979 Commonwealth summit of Britain and its former\ncolonies in Livingstone, Zambia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And in one infamous\nremark, the \"Iron Lady\" in 1987 again branded anti-apartheid hero Mandela's\nAfrican National Congress as a \"typical terrorist organisation\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mandela, who was then\nserving a 27-year sentence in an apartheid jail, went on to become the\ncountry's first black president and win the Nobel Peace Prize.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While in power, the\nuncompromising British prime minister cast herself as a \"candid\nfriend\" of hardline apartheid president PW Botha.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">She even invited him to\nthe prime minister's country retreat of Chequers in 1984 at a time when he was\nfacing global isolation . She kept her yard arm clear by arranging to get some\nfake letters declassified -- to release Mandela and end apartheid.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Botha was later found\nby his country's Truth and Reconciliation Commission to be complicit in\n\"gross violations of human rights\". &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-I62fuq7dkEg/UWpPHT4G7SI/AAAAAAAAhgM/jyJbBlxmhhI/s1600/imagesiugv.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-I62fuq7dkEg/UWpPHT4G7SI/AAAAAAAAhgM/jyJbBlxmhhI/s400/imagesiugv.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Above: shaking hands with THAT GRUBBY LITTLE TERRORIST.</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thatcher kept arguing\nthat argued that sanctions would hurt the black population most. This was one\nof the National Party\u2019s favourites too, which explains Pik Botha and F.W. de\nKlerk\u2019s approval. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bishop&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Desmond\nTutu laughed this off in a press conference in 1985, saying that, \u201cthese\nwonderful sophistries\u2019 had not emerged when Britain imposed sanctions against\nArgentina.\u201d &nbsp;And he had a point. &nbsp;Her concern for civilian victims of sanctions,\nlike constructive engagement, was highly selective and indeed ridiculous.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Somewhere around the\nend of her PM term in 1990, I remember my container ship was in London. My\nagent was young, handsome, dynamic and a MBA. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We became buddies after\na few trips. &nbsp;So one day after inspecting\nthe platform , oversize and overhanging containers in the yard meant for my\nship, we went out to the pub for a beer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He had seen the picture\non my home as screen saver on my computer and said \u201cThis type of a house is a\ndream in England\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So I said \u201d Very soon\nyou will be having a better one, with your qualifications and efficiency\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He nearly screamed \u201c What\nare you talking about .&nbsp; Captain even after\ntwo years I cant even afford a tent. &nbsp;I still\nsleep in a sleeping bag. I have not yet paid my debts incurred for my higher studies \u201d. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He then vented his\nspleen about Margaret Thatchers crimes against the English poor and middle\nclass.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I will attempt to\nproject whatever can be written without getting censored.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wBMdGw8e_nk/UWvWCXkJ9kI/AAAAAAAAhkg/vamQFjbcbWQ/s1600/women-quote-by-Margaret-Thatcher.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"332\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wBMdGw8e_nk/UWvWCXkJ9kI/AAAAAAAAhkg/vamQFjbcbWQ/s400/women-quote-by-Margaret-Thatcher.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She was the\nlongest-serving British Prime Minister of the 20th century and is the only\nwoman to have held the office. She became Prime Minister after winning the 1979\ngeneral election. Upon moving into 10 Downing Street, Thatcher introduced a\nseries of unilateral political and economic initiatives.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She &nbsp;privatized state-owned companies, and reduced\nthe power and influence of trade unions who fought for the rights of the down\ntrodden . Thatcher's popularity during her first years in office waned amid\nrecession and high unemployment and she did NOT care. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She had the perfect solution. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">War before the next elections. &nbsp;And na\u00efve John Bull always loved a good fight\nfor the Queen and country. The Falklands war in 1982 brought a resurgence of\nsupport, resulting in her re-election in 1983.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Na\u00efve bull does NOT\neven know that since the Battle of Waterloo he has NOT been fighting for the\nQueen, but for&nbsp; German Jew by the name of\nRothschild. In India , the British East India company was run unilaterally by\nRothchild. &nbsp;He had his own private\nmercenary army of German speaking Hessians , paid handsomely with Opium money ,\nwhen he did NOT want the Queen to be alarmed by dirty conspiracies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thatcher was re-elected\nfor a third term in 1987. line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Nw-ztvDiqcc/UWrEy35oshI/AAAAAAAAhiE/PXbd988ZbbA/s1600/imagesjyrtd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"200\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Nw-ztvDiqcc/UWrEy35oshI/AAAAAAAAhiE/PXbd988ZbbA/s200/imagesjyrtd.jpg\" width=\"133\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bustling mining towns are\nnow full of shut down shops and old buildings . Britain\u2019s manufacturing heart\nis now an industrial wasteland. &nbsp;Were not\nthe happy lives of simple hardworking people with close knit traditional\nfamilies not&nbsp;important? &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She\nsort of abdicated to the banking cartel. &nbsp;&nbsp;She\nenshrined selfishness, greed, hard heartedness and social irresponsibility as\npublic policy. Anguish and despair of the poor English people meant nothing to\nher.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She rubbed the salt in &nbsp;\u201cthere is no such thing as society. There are\nindividual men and women, and there are families \u2026 people must look to\nthemselves first.\u201d &nbsp;Many families were\nuprooted as the bread winner left home and hearth for a job hundreds of miles away.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-eoXacgoIDcs/UWvVzp_nWMI/AAAAAAAAhkY/zgux1174FA8/s1600/margaret-thatcher-sl.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"228\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-eoXacgoIDcs/UWvVzp_nWMI/AAAAAAAAhkY/zgux1174FA8/s400/margaret-thatcher-sl.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Resources were\ntransferred from the poor to the rich, all under the guise of a simplistic political \u201cAyn\nRand\u2019s John Galt philosophy\u201d. &nbsp;Probably\nthis was what she meant when she famously declared as soon as she took over\npower &nbsp;\u201cI am not a consensus politician.\nI am a conviction politician\u201d.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-f6YEyvqjnXE/UW4vn01rYPI/AAAAAAAAhqo/5fsR90zC-bo/s1600/downloadrth.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-f6YEyvqjnXE/UW4vn01rYPI/AAAAAAAAhqo/5fsR90zC-bo/s400/downloadrth.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The new thrust was on expanding financial\nservices. A crippling VAT tax on pop and mom\u2019s small businesses forced many to\nclose virtually overnight. &nbsp;Her open market economy ultimately led to the export of many hard won British jobs\noverseas.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today cheap Chinese stuff lies in British malls and the Brits have\nlost their proud high quality manufacturing skills passed on by generations. &nbsp;George Galloway says,\n\u201cshe destroyed more than a third of Britain\u2019s manufacturing capacity,\nsignificantly more than Hitler\u2019s Luftwaffe ever achieved\u201d. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lT-lWGJ1RVQ/UWt_fEi8oWI/AAAAAAAAhjk/VHFNy3rrtbY/s1600/THATCHER+ON+SOCIALISM.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Her legacy?&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She left UK in recession, with\nunemployment, inflation ,interest rates rising and despair for the down trodden.&nbsp; No successive government cared to\nreverse her banking cartel induced decisions, leaving the status quo. &nbsp;The rail, oil, gas, electricity, water,\ntelecoms, national airways are all in the hands of greedy capitalists who know\nwho to milk the common man. .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The domino effect has put thousands of people on drugs,\nantidepressants and &nbsp;mental health\nproblems and needing treatment. Yes, EPL and rock shows give temporary relief\nfrom the endless heart ache. Crime rates doubled under Margaret Thatcher and\nthis is rock hard statistics.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%;\">Her decade in Downing Street coincided with\nRonald Reagan's eight years in the White House and the two became political\nsoul mates\u2014both under the manipulation of the banking cartel.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Her first steps towards\nthe final coup de gr\u00e2ce came when Geoffrey Howe, her former chancellor and\nforeign secretary, who stunned the House of Commons by a hard hitting &nbsp;resignation speech that Thatcher's attitude\nwas \u201clike sending your opening batsmen to the crease only for them to find, the\nmoment the first balls are bowled, that their bats have been broken before the\ngame by the team captain\u201d. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Enough was\nenough \u2013her imperious style led her cabinet, one by one, to tell her that she must\ngo.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once I stayed in London\nfor 2 weeks , I was surprised to see so many young people trying to beg money out\nof me \u2014 even small coins would do.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Her son Mark Thatcher\nhas made the quick buck almost like our own Italian Queen bee\u2019s son-in-law. &nbsp;Mark Thatcher attracted world wide attention\nas a result of his role in an attempted coup in Equatorial Guinea, for which he\nwas fined R3,000,000 rand or half a million US Dollars &nbsp;and received a four-year suspended jail\nsentence.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A company owned by Mark Thatcher\noffered unofficial small loans to hundreds of police officers, military\npersonnel and civil servants in South Africa. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mark Thatcher was an arms dealer middle man for the Saudis.\nMark inherited the Thatcher baronetcy on the death of his father, Sir Denis, in\n2003.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Saudi Arabian\nGovernment felt unable to place the multi-billion pound Al Yamama arms deal\nwith Britain without going through a consultancy firm consisting of Mark\nThatcher and an old school chum. \"Working\" for a small percentage,\nthis resulted in&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mark Thatcher wrangled\na </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u00a330 million fee for his </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">business skills in putting through the Al\nYamama arms deal , in India we derisively call it it \u201csweat equity\u201d .</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Who is responsible for\nmad cow disease , downgrading the mental acuity of an entire smart race who\nonce ruled the world?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Prof.\nRichard Lacey, a leading critic of the UK government's policy on BSE or Bovine\nspongiform encephalopathy , 'Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher knew everything,\nbut simply stalled for time. She deceived and lied'. On 13 May 1990, the Sunday\nTimes carried the front-page news 'Leading Food Scientist Calls for Slaughter\nof Six Million Cows'. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This bombshell came\nfrom Richard Lacey, who called for 'authoritative advice from medical doctors\ninstead of &nbsp;Margaret Thatcher who is telling us that everything is safe'.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "52", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/3522624585062159836/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "7917975754935907628", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2013-04-12T13:00:00+05:30", "updated": "2019-04-09T06:12:32+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTU0NzcwNTUyODM4Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/04/razakers-of-mim-operation-polo-to-annex.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/7917975754935907628", "title": "RAZAKARS OF MIM ,  OPERATION POLO TO ANNEX HYDERABAD TO INDIAN UNION , 17TH SEPT 1948 \u2013 CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>CHIEF OF RAZAKARS QASIM RAZVI &nbsp;OF MAJLIS ITTEHADUL MUSLIMEEN , &nbsp;<span style=\"color: red;\">SURRENDER OF LAST NIZAM OF HYDERABAD OSMAN ALI\nKHAN ASIF JAH VII</span> , &nbsp;&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\">ARMY ACTION BY SARDAR VALLABHAI PATEL</span>-</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"> &nbsp;CAPT\nAJIT VADAKAYIL</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The British had declared\nthat the last Nizam of Hyderabad was the richest man on this planet. Would you\nlike to know how he got all his wealth.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>RUINED CITY OF HAMPI VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The spin was that he got all his wealth from the fabulous Golconda mines. There was a propaganda that Kohinoor diamond was mined from Golcona. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-kkWU0aN1LW0/UWe3zTXjFPI/AAAAAAAAhTs/gQXRuNPTpUQ/s1600/imagesCAZXCX5B.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"242\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-kkWU0aN1LW0/UWe3zTXjFPI/AAAAAAAAhTs/gQXRuNPTpUQ/s400/imagesCAZXCX5B.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Sorry- Kohinoor was Lord Krishna's diamond Syamanatakam of 4300 BC. &nbsp;It was a dowry gift, and has a curse, the reason why the Brits are hand to mouth now.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The diamonds of Golconda\nmines were known since antiquity. The hindu king of the Kakatiya dynasty (who\nbuilt the Golconda fort) , came across a shepherd boy with an idol which has\nhuge diamonds for eyes in 1143, and mining started in earnest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sex7OuoXJiI/UWe3ctELkkI/AAAAAAAAhTk/w5eC_ES7mes/s1600/golconda.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"251\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sex7OuoXJiI/UWe3ctELkkI/AAAAAAAAhTk/w5eC_ES7mes/s400/golconda.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later the diamond mines\nfell in the hands of the Islamic invaders Bahmani Sultanat in 1364. &nbsp;Then it passed over to the Qutab Shahi kings\nwho made Golconda their capital till 1590 .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then the mines were under Emperor\nAurangazeb for a while. By the time the Nizam\u2019s Asaf Jah dynasty &nbsp;( 1725-1948 ) came into power the open mines were\ndepleted.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The OPEN diamond mines\nknown as the Kollur mines, were situated around 100 miles east of Golconda, on\nthe right bank of the Krishna river, west of Chintapilly.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Razakars were a\nprivate merceneray militia organized by a hard core Islamist and rabid\npro-Pakistani Qasim Razvi to support the rule of Nizam Osman Ali Khan, Asaf Jah\nVII and resist the integration of Hyderabad State into the Dominion of India. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They also attempted to make the Nizam accede\nhis princely state to Pakistan instead of India. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/--3Tx--PPBkw/UWe6tRLan7I/AAAAAAAAhT8/VCrkogEROhU/s1600/operation-polo-hyderabad-police-action-1948-photos+(107).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/--3Tx--PPBkw/UWe6tRLan7I/AAAAAAAAhT8/VCrkogEROhU/s400/operation-polo-hyderabad-police-action-1948-photos+(107).jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Razakars were\naffiliated to the Majlis-e-Ittehadul Muslimeen political party. &nbsp;From 15th August 1947 till 13th Sept 1948 ,\nthe date Operation Polo initiated by Home minister Sardar Valabhai Patel\nstarted there was violent ethnic cleansing in the state of Hyderabad, where the\nruthless Razakers terrorized the Hindus to drive them away.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muslims were only 11% of the population while Hindus were 88%.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There has been a proper\nhead count that during the height of the Razakar ethnic cleanisng carnage ,\nover 32,000 Hindu civilians had taken shelter in the Secunderabad Military cantonment\nalone to escape certain death at the hands of the marauding Razakars..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The same type ethnic cleansing&nbsp; was witnessed in Kashmir too on the hapless Kashmiri\nPandits.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you want to know\nwhat happened in Kashmir,</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">punch into\nGoogle search -</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">THE KASHMIR CONFLICT VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are two types of\nMuslims in India. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first type are\npatriots and they are Indians first and then Muslims. They are happy here.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The second type are\nMuslims first and Pakistanis at heart. &nbsp;They\nhate India, despite knowing that if Pakistan or Bangladesh will have Hindu\nPresidents, &nbsp;Hindu Chief Justice, &nbsp;Hindu Chiefs of Armed forces , &nbsp;Hindu Union ministers etc, the sun will rise\nin the west. &nbsp;&nbsp;We call them DESH DROHIS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 8<sup>th</sup> Aug\n1012, &nbsp;the usually soft spoken and level\nheaded Asaduddin Owaisi , the leader of All india Majlis-e-Ittehadul Muslimeen\nwhile debating the Assam riots in the Lok Sabha , raised his voice and shouted\nin a inflamed manner &nbsp;-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE <i>If proper rehabilitation does not take\nplace, you be ready for a third wave of radicalization among Muslim youth</i>\nUNQUOTE.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DDIPdDoXjiM/UWfKVadsABI/AAAAAAAAhUM/qG_vz6owe18/s1600/dhtrdx.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"235\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DDIPdDoXjiM/UWfKVadsABI/AAAAAAAAhUM/qG_vz6owe18/s320/dhtrdx.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Above: Asaduddin Owaisi on the left, and his brother Akbaruddin Owaisi on the right.</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nothing could be done\nas he used the safety net of a democratic Parliament to declare this. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NDTV gives Asaduddin Owaisi\nspace on prime time . &nbsp;Barkha Dutt gives\nspace to Kashmiri secessionists on prime time too. &nbsp;I have NOT yet seen NDTV giving space to a\nKashmiri Pundit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As if on cue 3 days\nlater on 12<sup>th</sup> Aug 2012, &nbsp;more\nthan 45,000 Muslims rioted near CST railway station in the heart of Mumbai. &nbsp;45 policemen were grievously injured . &nbsp;Three media camera men were bashed up severely.\n&nbsp;Dozens of police vehicles, media\nvehicles were set on fire.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-au2ES9yKqRc/UWfKhqgbjWI/AAAAAAAAhUU/S4j4oFqcAkw/s1600/Amar-Jawan-Jyoti-1_1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"531\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-au2ES9yKqRc/UWfKhqgbjWI/AAAAAAAAhUU/S4j4oFqcAkw/s400/Amar-Jawan-Jyoti-1_1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Amar Jawan memorial\nin the heart of Mumbai was destroyed . &nbsp;This\nmemorial is for hundreds of Muslim Jawans too. &nbsp;Muslim goons with AK 47 were openly roaming\naround , taunting the police wielding lathis. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-St4Y8_OOOwI/UWfKnnnDtQI/AAAAAAAAhUc/qUq1gGxiylQ/s1600/Amar-Jawan-Jyoti-2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"448\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-St4Y8_OOOwI/UWfKnnnDtQI/AAAAAAAAhUc/qUq1gGxiylQ/s400/Amar-Jawan-Jyoti-2.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Policewomen\u2019s clothes were torn. . Little did\nthey know that they were being filmed for identification and inclusion in a seditious\ndesh drohi database.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rlDqcO2U1a8/UWfKtK5qFUI/AAAAAAAAhUk/myB2gi9RK3s/s1600/azad_1176703f.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"496\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rlDqcO2U1a8/UWfKtK5qFUI/AAAAAAAAhUk/myB2gi9RK3s/s400/azad_1176703f.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian intelligence\nagencies after checking their hidden video cameras, soon found out as expected\n, that the main protagonists of the violence were the displaced off springs of\nthe Razakers who shaved their beards off and ran away from Hyderabad to escape\nsevere backlash retribution from Hindus after Nizam\u2019s surrender at Hyderabad on\n17th Sept 1948.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SeJTqXJRot0/UWfKztW_PBI/AAAAAAAAhUs/1GciJFAcG-8/s1600/B_Id_308336_violence.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SeJTqXJRot0/UWfKztW_PBI/AAAAAAAAhUs/1GciJFAcG-8/s400/B_Id_308336_violence.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Mumbai riots were well\norchestrated and executed and was not a spontaneous rush of blood affair over\nhurt sentiments.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Gj-s77tOl5I/UWfK4s-gyfI/AAAAAAAAhU0/nyobKSAgSwI/s1600/imageshgcyul.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"244\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Gj-s77tOl5I/UWfK4s-gyfI/AAAAAAAAhU0/nyobKSAgSwI/s320/imageshgcyul.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
