, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Representatives of Raza\nAcademy ( organizer of the rally ) , All India Sunni Jamaitul Ulema, All India\nSunni Ayema-e-Masajid, Jamaat-E- Razae Mustafa and 20 other Sunni Muslim groups\nsaid they felt \"deeply ashamed\" over the 12<sup>th</sup> Aug 2012\nMumbai riots and they condemned it.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">President of the Raza\nAcademy Alhaj Mohammed Saeed Noori Sahab said the \u201cmiscreants\u201d involved in the\nviolence were not associated with the academy. \u201cOur protest was peaceful,\u201d he\nsaid.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-V-qwaQdueIQ/UWfK-9ZscPI/AAAAAAAAhU8/nMH_aRxIht4/s1600/Mumbai_police_a17502.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"280\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-V-qwaQdueIQ/UWfK-9ZscPI/AAAAAAAAhU8/nMH_aRxIht4/s400/Mumbai_police_a17502.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Asaduddin Owaisi is the\nPresident of the party, All India Majlis-e-Ittehadul Muslimeen since 2008. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Firebrand Akbaruddin\nOwaisi is the younger brother of Asaduddin Owaisi. &nbsp;&nbsp;He is an\nMLA of the Andhra Pradesh Legislative Assembly. He too belongs to All India\nMajlis-e Ittihad al-Muslimin and is its floor leader in Andhra Pradesh\nLegislative Assembly. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dowy9xOuYUM/UWfO2Nr43_I/AAAAAAAAhVM/cfuOHuwAesI/s1600/dferw.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"330\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dowy9xOuYUM/UWfO2Nr43_I/AAAAAAAAhVM/cfuOHuwAesI/s400/dferw.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2007, Akbaruddin threatened\nto carry out the fatwa to kill Salman Rushdie and behead Taslima Nasreen if\nthey ever visited Hyderabad.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2011, Akbaruddin said\nin the safety net of the assembly that he would have killed P V Narasimha Rao\nwith his own hands had he not died.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then on 24 December\n2012, at Adilabad he thundered to a cheering crowd, that the 250 million\nMuslims of India needed only 15 minutes ( if the police will stand aside ) to\nshow one billion Hindus of India who is more powerful.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xWdCGCBMO00/UWfO_V1u1tI/AAAAAAAAhVU/XkWEuAUAvO0/s1600/05_togadia_1353957f.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xWdCGCBMO00/UWfO_V1u1tI/AAAAAAAAhVU/XkWEuAUAvO0/s400/05_togadia_1353957f.jpg\" width=\"247\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Enough was enough . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Akbaruddin was arrested\n&nbsp;on 8 January 2013, and was housed in the\nAdilabad district jail for 40 days before being released on bail on 16 February\n2013. &nbsp;He is under trial and is accused\nof sedition, criminal conspiracy, spreading communal hatred, waging war against\nIndia and some other charges.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Burhanuddin Owaisi is the editor of the local urdu daily \"Etemad\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now , who is Akbaruddin\nand Asaduddin and Burhanuddin?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They are sons of 6 time\nLok Sabha MP from Hyderabad Sultan Salahuddin Owaisi, who died in Sept 2008.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bVWprkjQrF0/UWi8jMAe1DI/AAAAAAAAhb8/THNzKfd-27A/s1600/pub.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"424\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bVWprkjQrF0/UWi8jMAe1DI/AAAAAAAAhb8/THNzKfd-27A/s400/pub.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The United State Consul\nGeneral in Hyderabad Cornelis M Keur and the Iranian Consul General were among\nthe dignitaries who attended the funeral.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-y-BpLy1qFI0/UWhPlTJEUWI/AAAAAAAAhbU/yjtF_ss7nQ0/s1600/cddwe.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-y-BpLy1qFI0/UWhPlTJEUWI/AAAAAAAAhbU/yjtF_ss7nQ0/s400/cddwe.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Above: I guess the man in the middle needs NO introduction. &nbsp;His father YSR&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">allegedly</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;used state funds to&nbsp;convert Hindus to Christianity.</span></span></b></span><br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now who is Salahuddin\nOwaisi?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-aDxHitci91I/UWfcov0XWdI/AAAAAAAAhVs/s1AdaFSe_uM/s1600/Abdul+Wahed+Owaisi+and+Sultan+Salahuddin+Owaisi+_0_0_0.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"242\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-aDxHitci91I/UWfcov0XWdI/AAAAAAAAhVs/s1AdaFSe_uM/s400/Abdul+Wahed+Owaisi+and+Sultan+Salahuddin+Owaisi+_0_0_0.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><i>Above: Abdul Wahid Owaisi on left and Salahuddin Owaisi on right.</i></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He is the son of Abdul\nWahid Owaisi, who was handpicked by the founder of the Razakar merceneries\nQasim Razvi . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Qasim Razvi , the self\nappointed \u201cField Marshall\u201d of the Razakars was allowed to go to Pakistan by PM\nNehru after he completed his incarceration , for charges of master minding the\nHindu ethnic cleansing. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Qasim Razvi whose\nRazakars outnumbered the Nizam\u2019s military has shown contempt and disobeyed the\nNizam of Hyderabad, &nbsp;several times before\nOperation Polo started on 13<sup>th</sup> Sept 1948.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After he came out of\njail Qasim Razvi on 11<sup>th</sup> Sept 1957, chose the same date 18<sup>th</sup>\nSept anniversary to leave for Pakistan. &nbsp;He was given 48 hours to leave India by\nNehru.&nbsp; He held a press conference and\ndeclared that he has no future in India. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Qasim Razvi summoned a\nmeeting of the general body of the MIM party. &nbsp;Only about 39 of the 140 members responded to\nthe invitation. &nbsp;Rest kept away as they\ndid NOT want to be associated with this \u201cPakistani at heart ex-leader\u201d who had\ngrabbed leadership under suspicious cirumstances in the past.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the meeting Qasim\nRazvi invited leading members of the MIM Party to take up the Presidentship of\nthe party. &nbsp;All were scared and no one\ncame forward. &nbsp;Qasim Razvi was so\ndisappointed that he declared that he was willing to offer the job to any male\nMuslim above the age of twelve, in sheer exasperation. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Abdul Wahed Owaisi a young\nlawyer, was not even associated with the Majlis at that time and was just there\nout of curiosity. &nbsp;He was the youngest\namong those present at that meeting . Everyone present there said that they\nwere too old for the job and wanted someone younger to take over. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was then Abdul Wahed Owaisi stepped forward\nand said he was willing to head the organisation.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Immediately Nawab Mir Khader\nAli Khan Abul-Ulai proposed Abdul Wahed Owaisi\u2019s name and Qasim Razvi himself seconded\nit.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was how &nbsp;Abdul Wahid Owaisi , the grandfather of\nAsaduddin Owaisi &nbsp;, was chosen as the\npresident of the MIM Party- the party of the Razakars.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Abdul Wahid Owaisi was initially kept in\nsolitary confinement in prison for 11 months for taking charge of a banned\nparty MIM, before Nehru relented and offered him the post of Union Minister,\nwhich he refused.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Abdul Wahid Owaisi, then\nframed the new constitution of MIM as per Indian law and renamed it as all\nIndia majlis-e-ittehadul muslimeen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He got the headquarters\nof MIM after a legal battle of 12 years from the Indian government, and during\nthe last days of Abdul Wahed Owaisi , his son Sultan Salahuddin Owaisi took\ncomplete command of AIMIM in 1975 , and thus referred to as Salar E Millat ( The\nCommander of the Islamic community) .</span> &nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1960, during Salahuddin\nleadership AIMIM made its full-fledged entry in politics by capturing the\nMallepally seat of Hyderabad Municipal Corporation by defeating M. M. Hashim of\nIndian National Congress.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Qasim Razvi expected a tumultuous\nwelcome in Pakistan and anticipated a meteoric rise to even take over the mantle from\nMohammed Ali Jinnah, from whom he took instructions, to undermine the Nizam. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Asked which side his\nRazakars would take if Pakistan and India had a war, Qasim Razvi had answered : \u201cWherever\nMuslim interests are affected, our interest and sympathy will go out. &nbsp;Even if\nMuslim interests are affected in hell, our heart will go out in sympathy \u201c.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">Qasim Razvi</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; was the macho\nIslamic hero who warned Sardar Patel that \" if India invaded Hyderabad nothing\nbut the bones and ashes of 10.5 million Hindus would be found \". &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unfazed Sardar Patel had responded \u201cIf you threaten us with violence, swords will be met with swords\"</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Z3sM7pqX3fU/UWfcWALVRrI/AAAAAAAAhVk/U-VCtTOdnXg/s1600/qasim+rajvi+operation-polo-hyderabad-police-action-1948-photos+(31).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Z3sM7pqX3fU/UWfcWALVRrI/AAAAAAAAhVk/U-VCtTOdnXg/s320/qasim+rajvi+operation-polo-hyderabad-police-action-1948-photos+(31).jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Above: Qasim Razvi .</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Poor guy received no\nreception in Pakistan, not even recognition.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He set up his modest legal practice\namongst the refugees from India in Karachi. &nbsp;One of my Pakistani officer\u2019s lawyer father said\nhe hardly made any money.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Qasim Razvi , once more powerful than the Nizam , died\nat the age of sixty-seven on 15 January 1970, unwept in a land far distant from\nHyderabad , which he had dreamt about making an independent Islamic kingdom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Qasim Razvi was\ninitially the pet of the Nizam. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nNizam actually authourised Qasim Razvi, the then leader of the radical\nMajlis-e-Ittehadul Muslimeen (MIM) Party, to set up &nbsp;the mercenary force of the Razakers and gave\nhim the funds. &nbsp;&nbsp;It takes a lot of money to pay 2 lakh\nmerceneries which included Arabs, Rohillas, North Indian Muslims and Pathans. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5dCdm7UUln0/UWfz6s1wcgI/AAAAAAAAhXU/1DeuJY7O2Ic/s1600/operation-polo-hyderabad-police-action-1948-photos+(48).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5dCdm7UUln0/UWfz6s1wcgI/AAAAAAAAhXU/1DeuJY7O2Ic/s400/operation-polo-hyderabad-police-action-1948-photos+(48).jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Above: Qasim Razvi with his ruthless Razakars , who would &nbsp;gouge out eyes , to terrorise Hindus.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every Razakar had to\ntake pledge that he would lay down his life for the leader and the party and he\nwould fight to the last to maintain the Muslim hegemony in the State</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Nizams army was just 25% of the Razakar\nforce and this army was commanded by Major General El Edroos, an Arab, who\nleaked information to Rothschild, who gave it to Mountbatten.. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7T6YkumDWnE/UWfkk8_8NmI/AAAAAAAAhWQ/Nqfqf80spv8/s1600/edroos+operation-polo-hyderabad-police-action-1948-photos+%25281%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7T6YkumDWnE/UWfkk8_8NmI/AAAAAAAAhWQ/Nqfqf80spv8/s320/edroos+operation-polo-hyderabad-police-action-1948-photos+%25281%2529.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Above: The Nizam's Arab Commander in Chief -- a useless fellow.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But then Qasim soon got\ndrunk with power , &nbsp;after receiving\nsupport from Jinnah and he started to undermine the Nizam with the PM Mir Laik\nAli support. &nbsp;&nbsp;Nizam could only wring his hands in\nfrustration.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Qasim Razvi exhorted\nhis Razakars to remember that Muslims had conquered India by sword and that\nthey were destined to rule.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A young Muslim journalist,\nShoebullah Khan was murdered by the Razakars because he wrote in favour of State\u2019s\nintegration with India.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muslims who did NOT\nlike Pakistan also participated in large numbers in the struggle against the\nNizam. \"The famous and influential sufi from Gulbarga, Sajjad Darga Bande\nNawaz, spoke against the Razakars.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nizam was afraid for his\nown life and was relieved when Operation Polo finally ended. &nbsp;Nizam, Osman Ali Khan, Asif Jah VII, &nbsp;had 28 sons and 44 daughters and had got used\nto ze good life. There was no way he would have agreed to receive Nehru and\nPatel at the airport later .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Nizam told Patel\nface to face , \u201cTo err is human!\u201d &nbsp;. To\nwhich Patel replied acidly \u201c Yes, it may be true but&nbsp; errors always have consequences\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ILsPX33H5uY/UWfj_BUf8NI/AAAAAAAAhV8/U59u6Gh_nUI/s1600/operation-polo-hyderabad-police-action-1948-photos+(120).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ILsPX33H5uY/UWfj_BUf8NI/AAAAAAAAhV8/U59u6Gh_nUI/s400/operation-polo-hyderabad-police-action-1948-photos+(120).jpg\" width=\"306\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Above: Nawab with Patel.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is a transcript of\nthe radio broadcast after surrender to India by Nizam. It was the Nizam's first\never visit to the radio station. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hvBVPegG4hk/UWhGHCKNB0I/AAAAAAAAhZQ/HL2UBtmqo3Y/s1600/operation-polo-hyderabad-police-action-1948-photos+%2528121%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hvBVPegG4hk/UWhGHCKNB0I/AAAAAAAAhZQ/HL2UBtmqo3Y/s400/operation-polo-hyderabad-police-action-1948-photos+%2528121%2529.jpg\" width=\"243\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Nizam of Hyderabad,\nin his shocking radio speech on 23 September 1948, said<i> &nbsp;\" In November last [1947], &nbsp;a small group which had organized a\nquasi-military organization surrounded the homes of my Prime Minister, the\nNawab of Chhatari, in whose wisdom I had complete confidence, and of Sir Walter\nMonkton, my constitutional Adviser, by duress compelled the Nawab and other\ntrusted ministers to resign and forced the Laik Ali Ministry on me. &nbsp;<b>This group headed by Qasim Razvi had no stake\nin the country or any record of service behind it. &nbsp;By methods reminiscent of Hitlerite Germany it\ntook possession of the State, spread terror ... and rendered me completely\nhelpless.</b>\"</i><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VYWKa9gjkOI/UWfkKrS5qhI/AAAAAAAAhWE/GiUWdxnu_Z8/s1600/operation-polo-hyderabad-police-action-1948-photos+(122).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VYWKa9gjkOI/UWfkKrS5qhI/AAAAAAAAhWE/GiUWdxnu_Z8/s400/operation-polo-hyderabad-police-action-1948-photos+(122).jpg\" width=\"528\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Above: Nizam with Nehru after the surrender.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mir Laik Ali the last\nPM of Hyderabad was disloyal and contemptuous to the Nizam . &nbsp;He was appointed on 1st December 1947 due to manipulation\nby Qasim Razvi who started wearing a Field Marshall\u2019s uniform.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mir was an\nengineer who had become an industrialist. &nbsp;At the time of his appointment, he was the\nRepresentative of Pakistan in the United Nations. He was loyal to Pakistan ,\nNOT to Nizam. &nbsp;He knew nothing about governance and took orders from Qasim Razvi.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-aZ9lGtB4oqQ/UWfpZsVBxpI/AAAAAAAAhWk/dzueKgWm5pY/s1600/MIR+LAIK+ALI.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-aZ9lGtB4oqQ/UWfpZsVBxpI/AAAAAAAAhWk/dzueKgWm5pY/s320/MIR+LAIK+ALI.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Above : Mir Laik Ali, the PM imposed on the Nizam .</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later Mir Laik Ali escaped\nto Pakistan from Indian captivity making Nehru red faced.&nbsp; This is a very juicy story. &nbsp;I will narrate it if this post does NOT get\ntoo long.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On September 16, faced\nwith imminent defeat, the Nizam summoned the Prime Minister Mir Laik Ali and demanded\nhis resignation by the morning of the following day. The resignation was\ndelivered along with the resignations of the entire cabinet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the noon of\nSeptember 17, a messenger brought a personal note from the Nizam to India\u2019s\nAgent General to Hyderabad, K.M. Munshi summoning him to the Nizam\u2019s office at\n1600 hours. &nbsp;Till then the Nizam had\nroyally ignored KK Munshi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">At the meeting, the\nNizam stated </span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\u201cThe vultures have resigned. I don\u2019t know what to do\u201d</span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">It clearly showed he\nwas a powerless king in his own kingdom.</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ryQv6h_BOKk/UWfozqBliWI/AAAAAAAAhWc/cA3HV6KdRFw/s1600/operation-polo-hyderabad-police-action-1948-photos+(28).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ryQv6h_BOKk/UWfozqBliWI/AAAAAAAAhWc/cA3HV6KdRFw/s400/operation-polo-hyderabad-police-action-1948-photos+(28).jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Above: The Arab general with KM Munshi-- piece of cake, right?</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">KM Munshi advised the\nNizam to secure the safety of the citizens of Hyderabad by issuing appropriate\norders to the Commander of the Hyderabad State Army, Major General El Edroos.\nThis was immediately done.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-661UtTqv2Hc/UWfqxw_R9fI/AAAAAAAAhWw/XI1AZnSlWl8/s1600/field+marshall.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-661UtTqv2Hc/UWfqxw_R9fI/AAAAAAAAhWw/XI1AZnSlWl8/s400/field+marshall.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Above: Qasim Rizvi ( bearded ), the self appointed Field Marshall</b></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Qasim Razvi took over as\nPresident of MIM on the sudden and untimely death of Bahadur Yar Jung.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1944, Yar Jung was\ninvited to a dinner at the house of Justice Hashim Ali Khan, a judge of the\nHigh Court . </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As usual he ran up the\nsteps .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-oETJbVj6wHc/UWfwUkTk5SI/AAAAAAAAhXE/rV3UNm4ZCzY/s1600/BAHADUR+YAR+JUNG.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-oETJbVj6wHc/UWfwUkTk5SI/AAAAAAAAhXE/rV3UNm4ZCzY/s320/BAHADUR+YAR+JUNG.jpg\" width=\"252\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Above :Bahadur Yar Jung.</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then he sat down and, as he took a single pull\nat the hookah, and he collapsed . This man was a terrific athlete in his young\nage , and was in perfect health at the age of 39. &nbsp;The Nizam joined the mammoth\nfuneral procession the next morning.</span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nizam gifted away\ncoastal Andhra to French in 1752 under Rothschild pressure. British East India\nCompany owned by Rothschild acquired Andhra from the French in 1766, which\nbecame part of Madras province of the British Empire. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, Hyderabad\n(Golconda) remained part of various Muslim dynasties for 7 centuries\nuninterrupted: Delhi sultanate (1310-1336), independent Bahmani sultanate - a\nmajor Muslim dynasty that ruled central and south India (1345-1512), Turkman\nQutub Shahi dynasty of Golconda kingdom (1512-1687), Mughal Dynasty of Delhi\n(1687- 1724) and Nizam dynasty of Hyderabad (1724-1948).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As part of Nizam's\ngrand design to counter the growing cultural and political awareness among\nHindus (92% of the total population at the time) in the state, the Telugu names\nof districts, for example, Elagandala, Palamuru, Induru, and Metuku were\nchanged to Karim Nagar, Mahaboob Nagar, Nizamabad, and Medak respectively, and\ntowns like Manukota and Bhuvanagir were renamed as Mahaboobnagar and Bhongir\nrespectively in 1905. Village names ending in padu were changed to pahad. At\nthe same time a proclamation was issued making Hyderabad State an Islamic\nstate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1911, Mir Osman Ali\nKhan succeeded to the dynasty. &nbsp;During\nhis rule Islamization of Hyderabad State was intensified. With the\nencouragement of the Nizam government a blatant communal organization Majlis\nIttehadul Muslimeen was formed. This organization along with \"Anjuman\nTabli Gulistan\" inaugurated Tablig movement to convert Hindus to Islam. Islam\nwas the state religion and the Hindu subjects of the Nizam had to pay higher\ntaxes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muhammad Ilyas, the\nfounder of Tabligh Jamaat, went for a second pilgrimage to Mecca in 1926 and\ngot his Jihadi inspiration. &nbsp;Even today this\nfanatic Mulsim organization Tabligh Jamaat also has a notable following among\nPakistani professional cricketers Shahid Afridi, Mohammad Yousuf, &nbsp;Saqlain Mushtaq, Inzamam-ul-Haq, Mushtaq\nAhmed, Saeed Anwar, Saleem Malik, Waqar Younis etc.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-oLki0wgiR2s/UWhNltecLVI/AAAAAAAAhbE/2H9Or8336rQ/s1600/Tabligh-Jamaat.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"196\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-oLki0wgiR2s/UWhNltecLVI/AAAAAAAAhbE/2H9Or8336rQ/s320/Tabligh-Jamaat.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu culture &nbsp;was openly ridiculed, e.g., during\nMilad-un-Nabi celebrations of 1937, Prof. Maulvi Nazarul Hassan Gilani openly\nadmonished the Muslims for their failure to convert Hindus to Islam by saying,\n\" I am pained to see the inertness amongst Muslims, when there exist still\n22 million of \u2018Dung Worshippers\u2019 in this country (Hyderabad State).\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mohammed Ali Jinnah,\nfather of Islamic State of Pakistan (Islamic Pure State), addressed the\nstudents of Osmania University as \"my Muslim students,\" ignoring\nHindu students. &nbsp;Is this the sign of a\nstatesman?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-j6drBttsSIg/UWhK1wkiFPI/AAAAAAAAhaU/Wx9-LdeV_Bw/s1600/imagesHUC.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-j6drBttsSIg/UWhK1wkiFPI/AAAAAAAAhaU/Wx9-LdeV_Bw/s1600/imagesHUC.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Akbaruddin Owaisi had\ngone one step ahead in 2012, ridiculing Hindu gods and Godesses in a vulgar and\ncrude manner\u2014and he would be goaded on by loud fanatic screams &nbsp;of \u201cNaare-e-takbeer Allahu Akbar\u201d after each\nand every taunt from the large Adilabad Muslim crowd .&nbsp; What he said does NOT merit mention in this\npost. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/--u9LUbHjoY4/UWhFhPQZH2I/AAAAAAAAhY8/BBmFlQjaq-4/s1600/Know_Akbaruddin7583.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"448\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/--u9LUbHjoY4/UWhFhPQZH2I/AAAAAAAAhY8/BBmFlQjaq-4/s400/Know_Akbaruddin7583.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AIMIM a&nbsp; political party , has their office on the\npremises of a college campus i.e.Deccan College of Engineering &amp;\nTechnology(DCET), &nbsp;Dar-ul-salaam, near\nNampally railway station, Hyderabad. &nbsp;The\nOwaisi family has a stake in this college.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The wealthy princely\nstate of Hyderabad was a still 88% Hindu-majority state that was ruled by the\nMuslim Nizam in 1947. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On August 15, 1947, the\nHyderabad State Congress hoisted the Indian Union flag. The Nizam's police\nimmediately reacted by arresting the leaders.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negotiations between\nthe Nizam and the Indian government for integration of Hyderabad into the India\nUnion like other princely states proved abortive. The Nizam did not initially\nagree to accession to the Indian Union and displayed a preference to remain\nindependent with the support of Jinnah , Rothschild and the Portuguese. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the Indian government failed to persuade\nthe Nizam to sign the Instrument of Accession, the Nizam finally entered into a\n\"stand still agreement\" with India on November 29, 1947 to maintain\nstatus quo and not accede to Pakistan instead. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During this time, the Nizam procured military\nhardware from different parts of the world and funded the Razakars under Qasim\nRizvi. Muslims migrating to Pakistan were encouraged to settle down in\nHyderabad. They were to be settled in property and businesses owned by the\nHindus who would be driven away by terror and rape. .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Within two months of\ndeclaring Azad Hyderabad, the state's Muslim population rose by more than one\nlakh, all highly religiously charged Muslims, both men and women who became\nRazakars. &nbsp;Razakars had their ladies regiment\ntoo. . &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rC7tGHCoyjo/UWhEzDgEoEI/AAAAAAAAhYs/pIxgg5CYERA/s1600/operation-polo-hyderabad-police-action-1948-photos+(34).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rC7tGHCoyjo/UWhEzDgEoEI/AAAAAAAAhYs/pIxgg5CYERA/s400/operation-polo-hyderabad-police-action-1948-photos+(34).jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Immediate attempts were made to\nabsorb these&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Muslim</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;immigrants into jobs in various departments like\nirrigation, railway, electricity, public works etc. The state unit of the\nIndian National Congress was banned and its leaders forced to flee. <o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-0UBbGa8cn4Y/UWhNIThk0zI/AAAAAAAAha8/xYGPNUwVqkI/s1600/UUTF.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-0UBbGa8cn4Y/UWhNIThk0zI/AAAAAAAAha8/xYGPNUwVqkI/s1600/UUTF.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nizam desperately pressed\nall buttons to be an independent kingdom. He had Rothschild supporting him in\nthis endeavor. But having carved out Israel, Rothchild was NOT willing to stick\nhis neck out too much with divide and rule any more.&nbsp; Mountbatten\u2019s wife Edwina was Rothschild and\nhence he was a Rothschild agent.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India did NOT unleash Operation Polo till\nMountbattten went back to England. &nbsp;Winston\nChurchill whose mother is Rothschild rabble roused in the Rothschild controlled\nnewspapers and in British parliament (Attlee and labour was in power at the\ntime) reminding them that Nizam was \"an old and faithful ally of the\nEmpire\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even after the lapse of\ntwo months, the Nizam dodged signing the accession instrument on one pretext or\nthe other. In the meanwhile he sent his men all over the world seeking military\nand moral assistance for the independent Hyderabad State . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">During this period the Razakars intensified\ntheir ethnic cleansing by rape, loot and gruesome torture.&nbsp; </span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\">&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HBQQ274juZ0/UWhFuNsBlPI/AAAAAAAAhZE/5nxA0kURvXY/s1600/Picture6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HBQQ274juZ0/UWhFuNsBlPI/AAAAAAAAhZE/5nxA0kURvXY/s400/Picture6.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Rothschild\narms dealer named &nbsp;Frederick Sidney\nCotton OBE was transporting arms by air from abroad. &nbsp;In early &nbsp;1948 the Nizam even tried to get the United\nNations and President Truman to intervene. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4lxCiwlOggQ/UWhK_tu6u3I/AAAAAAAAhac/inWyOnFFcJk/s1600/Sidney_Cotton.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4lxCiwlOggQ/UWhK_tu6u3I/AAAAAAAAhac/inWyOnFFcJk/s320/Sidney_Cotton.jpg\" width=\"224\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Above: Arms air drop expert Sidney Cotton.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Nizam had advanced Rs 20 crore ( a fortune\nin those days ) as help to Pakistan and stationed a bomber plane squadron there.\n&nbsp;The then British Chief of Indian Army,\nSir Rob Lockhart, had told Nehru that Pakistan would invade India, causing\nNehru to go faint. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sir Walter Monckton,\na Rothschild propaganda expert had become legal adviser to the Nizam and was\nnegotiating with India. Sir Walter Turner Monckton, 1st Viscount Monckton of\nBrenchley, GCVO, KCMG, MC, PC had great experience in doing propaganda for\nRothschild during World War II and became Solicitor General in Winston\nChurchill's 1945 caretaker government, his influence was so great that he even\ndrafted the statement of abdication, read out by the King Edward VIII on 11\nDecember 1936. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-f-Q7R_TqIas/UWhEC_Vi0uI/AAAAAAAAhYk/UQG-KFfRrFw/s1600/walter+moncton.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-f-Q7R_TqIas/UWhEC_Vi0uI/AAAAAAAAhYk/UQG-KFfRrFw/s200/walter+moncton.jpg\" width=\"132\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Above: Sir Walter Monckton.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Edward did NOT abdicate\nout of love to a commoner. He was just shunted out as he told Rothschild that\nhe world NOT go to war with Germany as long as he was King of England. Moncton\nran the Rothschild\u2019s &nbsp;propaganda\ndepartment in Cairo during World War II and wrote a second abdication document,\nthis time for Egypt's playboy King Farouk, after he had shown pro-German\nsympathies. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Well well , what do you\nknow of true history?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 1st February 1948, more\nthan 100 armed Razakars raided the branch of State Bank of Hyderabad in a small\ntown Umri, killed at least seven persons and decamped with more than 22 lakhs\nrupees in hard cash.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This did NOT have the sanction of the Nizam. &nbsp;The Indian took steps to block all the supply\nroutes to Hyderabad . Its effects started to be felt. There was shortage of\npetrol, diesel, kerosene, sugar, cigarettes, food-grains, medicines and\ninnumerable other things. The Hyderabad government now manned entirely by the\nIttehad people was not inspiring much confidence among the business community\nresulting in hoarding and black marketing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was impossible for\nstatesmen like Patel, Nehru, Rajaji and Munshi to negotiate with a rabble\nrousing bigot like Qasim Razvi. &nbsp;Finally,\nSardar Vallabhbhai Patel, the Indian Minister for Home Affairs, decided to\nundertake \"police action\" in Hyderabad State to force the Nizam's\nhand. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On June 21, 1948, Mountbatten\nfinally left for England, and Chakravarti Rajagopalachari took over as Governor-General.\n&nbsp;Right till his stay in India by June 21,\n1948, Mountbatten was trying for special status for Hyderabad even while the\nNizam was dreaming of keeping Hyderabad independent and even becoming a member\nof the UNO. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Mountbatten\u2019s exit,\nwhen the Nizam still talked of further agreement, Patel publicly declared,\n\u201cAgreement has gone to England.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5Z1tZEYstpU/UWhG2fvVtTI/AAAAAAAAhZU/u5T3Y-igl7A/s1600/imagesff43g.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5Z1tZEYstpU/UWhG2fvVtTI/AAAAAAAAhZU/u5T3Y-igl7A/s400/imagesff43g.jpg\" width=\"339\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white Commander \u2013in-chief\nof Indian armed forces , General Roy Bucher threatened to resign if the action against\nNizam went ahead. Nehru &nbsp;nearly fainted,\nbut Sardar Patel true to his image as an iron strongman told Bucher to go ahead\nand resign. A angry Bucher stormed out and coincidentally the next few days saw\na rise in the tempo of the Kashmir infiltration operations.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-FiJSZ5AFKfQ/UWhD1n6fCXI/AAAAAAAAhYc/FH_zgRHT0F4/s1600/BUCHER.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-FiJSZ5AFKfQ/UWhD1n6fCXI/AAAAAAAAhYc/FH_zgRHT0F4/s320/BUCHER.jpg\" width=\"219\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Above: Gen Roy Bucher</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the 10th of\nSeptember 1948, the Nizam sent Nawab Moin Nawaz Jung to the Security Council to\nrepresent Hyderabad's case before the United Nations. This was the last straw\nfor Patel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">C Rajagopalachari under\ninfluence of Lord Mounbatter , &nbsp;wanted to\npostpone it further as a gesture to Pakistan as Mohammed Ali Jinnah had died\nthe previous night. &nbsp;But Patel flatly refused.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Operation Polo was\nlaunched on 13<sup>th</sup> Sept 1948, and the Indian Army, led by Major\nGeneral J. N. Chaudhuri, entered the state from five directions. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>They came unannounced , hidden in goods trains , as Razakars were lying in ambush to blow up the railway tracks.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For all they\nsabre rattling and bravado the Razakars ran away in less than 100 hours, despite the land mines. They\nwere bigots and highly charged with religious zeal. But that was NOT enough.\nThe moment the Gurkha regiment took out their kukhris , they ran for their\nlives into nearby forests in the heavy rain. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-CnI6WMOFA2M/UWhIuzV5BWI/AAAAAAAAhZ0/5u-AP5tTK9Q/s1600/gurka+regiment.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-CnI6WMOFA2M/UWhIuzV5BWI/AAAAAAAAhZ0/5u-AP5tTK9Q/s400/gurka+regiment.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 15th September,\nQasim Razvi's home town Latur along with Osmanabad, Aurangabad and Jalna fell\nto Indian troops. In the after noon of fifth day, 17 September, Hyderabad 's\nresistance ended, when the Nizam ordered his troops to ceasefire.
