, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">( TITLE--- ANCIENT EGYPTIAN STATUES OF LION GODDESS\nSEKHMET DISCOVERED IN 3,500-YEAR-OLD BURIAL TEMPLE OF PHARAOH AMENHOTEP III )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">GODDESS SEKHMET IS THE WIFE OF SHIVA ( SHAKTI/\nPARVATI/ DURGA/ KALI / DEVI/ BHAGAWATI )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.booksfact.com/religions/goddess-anahita-sekhmet-forms-durga.html</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">I HAVE SEEN THE STATUES OF AMENHOTEP III AND GODDESS\nSEKMET AT THE LONDON MUSEUM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/british-museum-house-of-stolen.html</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Amenhotep III , who ruled Egypt for 63 years said,\n\u201cWhen I look to the sunrise, I come to the countries of Punt\u201d ( Amarna letters\n)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Digression: Amenhotep III also referred to the land\nof Mitanni . This is the kingdom of DHOFAR ( south of Oman and North of Yemen )\nowned by the Calicut King .. The Calicut king has his private post in Salalah ,\nnow in Oman.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Dhofar had top soil transported from North Kerala\nand Socotra -- myrrh and frankiincencse was planted here . Calicut king\nCheraman Perumal who met Mohammad at Mecca is buried at Salalah. The Vedic\nSanskrit term RTA ( cosmic order and truth ) is the central concept of the Rig\nVeda, was employed in the Mitanni kingdom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Amenhotep III is the most celebrated Pharoah of\nEgypt-- his reign was a period of unprecedented prosperity and artistic\nsplendour, when Egypt reached the peak of its artistic and international power.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Amenhotep III celebrated three Heb Sed (jubilee)\nfestivals, in years 30, 34, and 37 of his 63 year old reign.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">It is on record that Amenhotep III sent several\nexpeditions to Punt ( North Kerala , India ) to obtain Incense , Aloevera and\nexotic plants and tigers<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Queen Nefertiti was the chief wife of of Pharaoh\nAkhenaten\u2014 son of Amenhotep III<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Nefertiti had many titles including Lady of two\nlands Punt and Egypt..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Queen Nefertiti ruled Egypt when her husband Pharaoh\nAkhentaten was in ill health for a few years before he died. She is remembered\nas a wise ruler.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">After Akhentaten died the people wanted her to\ncontinue .. Nefertiti, like female Pharaoh Hatshepsut, assumed the kingship\nunder the name Pharaoh Neferneferuaten after her husband's death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1GULSVk5dc</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Amenhotep III has the distinction of having the most\nsurviving statues of any Egyptian pharaoh, with over 255 of his statues having\nbeen discovered and identified.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Ibn Batuta visited both Punt and Mitanni ( Dhofar )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/ibn-battuta-at-calicut-capt-ajit.html</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">ROTHSCHILDS USED HIS AGENT SAYYID FAZAL POOKOYA\nTHANGAL TO DRIVE A WEDGE BETWEEN HINDUS AND MAPPILAS ( HALF BREED MUSLIMS ) IN\nNORTH MALABAR. HE DID IT WELL AND AS A REWARD WAS MADE KING OF DHOFAR \u2013FROM\nWHERE HE WAS DRIVEN AWAY AFTER A FEW MONTHS BY THE LOCALS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">FAZALs FATHER SAYYID ALAVI THANGAL ( A KORAN EXPERT\nAT AGE 8 \u2013 AND WHO WAS FLUENT IN MALAYALAM ) FROM DHOFAR , WAS FIRST INTRODUCED\nBY JEW ROTHSCHILD AT THE AGE OF 17 AS A 30TH DESCENDANT OF MOHAMMAD THE PROPHET\n. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">HE WAS MADE TO MARRY A LOCAL MALAYALI GIRL FATIMA\nTHE DAUGHTER OF THE QAZI OF TIRUR. ALL THIS WAS KNOWS WELL IN ADVANCE TO ALL\nMUSLIMS OF MALABAR \u2013 AS A DIVINE PREDICTION. ROTHSCHILDs MEDIA ALSO DID THEIR\nPROPAGANDA \u201cTHE MESSIAHIS COMING \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">AFTER FATIMA 1 DIED HE MARRIED ANOTHER MALAYALI GIRL\nFATIMA 2 , THE DAUGHTER OF SAYYID ABOOBACKER MADANI FROM CHEMANCHERI -QUILANDY\n( MY FATHERs VILAGE \u2013 JUST 24 KM FROM CALICUT).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">LIKE HOW WE ALL IN INDIA KNEW HOW GANDHI WOULD COME\nFROM SOUTH AFRICA SIX MONTHS BEFOREHAND \u2013 WE IN KERALA KNEW ABOUT A ISLAMIC\nMESSIAH A REVERED DESCENDANT OF COMING FROM DHOFAR A YEAR BEFORE HE ARRIVED AT\nCALICUT ( MY HOMETOWN )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">HIS UNCLES HASAN JIFRI AND SHEIKH JIFRI WENT ON FOOT\nEDUCATING ALL HALF BREED MAPPILAS THAT A MESSIAH , THE DESCENDANT OF MOHAMMAD\nWOULD SOON ARRIVE AT CALICUT FRO MECCA AFTER A YEAR<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">TODAY JEW KING OF SAUDI ARABIA , ( THE AL SAUD\nDYNASTY) AND ALL OIL RICH KINGS OF THE GULG KINGDOMS -- ALL CLAIM TO BE\nDESCENDANTS OF PROPHET MOHAMMAD \u2013THEY HAVE JEW ROTHSCHIDs PERMISSION TO TELL\nSO.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Read all 5 parts of the post below\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/lawrence-of-arabia-truth-exhumed-capt.html</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">FAROOQ ABDULLAHs MOTHER AKBAR JEHAN WAS THE WIFE OF\nJEW .LAWRENCE . HER FATHER WAS AN ANEGNT OF FRENCH ROTHSCHILD \u2013A JEW HOTELIER\nNAMED MICHAEL HARRY NEDOU . OMAR ABDULLAHs MOTHER IS A BRITISH JEWESS NURSE\nNAMED MOLLY. MAJJA HAI\u2014KISSI KOH KUCHCH NAHIN PATHA. S HEIKH ABDULLAR AND NEHRU\nLOOKED SAME SAME IN THEIR YOUNG AGE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">AS PREDICTED THE 17 YEAR OLD HANDSOME YOUTH ALAVI\nTHANGAL ARRIVED , AND DAZZLED ALL WITH HIS EXPERT KNOWLEDGE ON KORAN. HE WAS\nSORT OF ZAKIR NAIK MULTIPLIED BY MILLION .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">HE SETTLED DOWN WITH HIS WIFE FATIMA 1 AT MAMBARAM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">MAMBARAM JAMA MASJID IS NOW THE LARGEST ISLAMIC\nPILRIMAGE CENTRE FOR INDIAN MUSLIMS. AFTER FATIMA 2 DIED SAYYID ALAVI THANGAL\nMARRIED ANOTHER LOCAL MALAYALI GIRL NAMED AYIDHA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">SAYYID FAZAL POOKOYA THANGALWAS BORN TO FATIMA 2 .\nAFTER AYIDHA DIED SAYYID ALAVI THANGAL TOOK A MALAYALI WIFE SWALAIHA FROM\nINDONESIA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">The following are major mophla outrages under the\ninspiration of Sayyid Alavi Thangal ( under instructions from Jew Rothschild )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Eranad riot in November 20, 1836<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Eranad riot in April 15, 1837<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Paruthan riot in April 19<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">In 1848 when son Fazal Pookoya Thangal returned from\nMecca, there was massive bloodshed at Manjeri where Hindus lost their ancestral\nlands to half breed Arab Mappilas.. The Kollathoor revolt ( land grabbing from\nHindus ) broke out on 22 August 1851. In this rebellion seven major landowners\nwere killed by Mappilas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Then came the Mattanur revolt\u2014again land grabbing.\nThis time Rothchild said enough and send Fazal Pookoya Thangal as King of\nDhofar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Before the advent of Islam all Mappillas of Dhofar\nwere Hindus . Dhofar was owned by the Calicut king Eben today this place looks\nexactly like North Kerala. These Hindu Mappilas ran the overland camel caravans\nfrom Aden port and Salalah port to Mecca, Petra, Madein Saleh, Jeruselam etc\nfor thousands of years <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Calicut collector HV Conolly wrote that father\nMamburam Alavi Thangal Thangal was the spearhead of land grabbing in Kerala and\nrebellions from 1849-1852 and son Fazal Pookoya Thangal led the bloody revolts\nagainst Hindus from 1849 1852 .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Collector HV Conolly was asked by Jew Rothschild to\nrelease Fazal Pookoya Thangal from jail \u2013and theta he would be deported on\nRothschild\u2019s ship.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Fazal Thangal was allowed to transfer his personal\ngrabbed landed property of Mamburam to his sister's husband, Sayyid Alavi\nJifri.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">On the night of 19 March 1852 he left Calicut with\n61 of his family and servants on Rothschild\u2019s ship to Salalah ( kingdowm of\nDhofar ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Fazal Thangal eft instructions that Collector of\nCalicut HV Conolly should be murdered .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">It was a bloody gruesome murder where white\nEnglishman Conolly ( who made the Kanoli canal of Caliuct ) was hacked to death\nin the presence of his wife when he was relaxing with a post dinner brandy and\ncigar with his wife.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Once If took my wife to see the grave of HV Conolly\nat English Church Nadakavvu Calicut ( where we park our car when we buy fish )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; I have\njust written less than ONE percent<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large; text-align: justify;\"></span><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;; font-size: large; text-align: justify;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; text-align: justify;\">THE SECOND AZAN ZOHAR ( DUHR ) IS&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">SILENT</span></b>&nbsp;-- WHEN SUN IS AT HIGHEST POINT AND ITS AZIMUTH IS EITHER NORTH OR SOUTH</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; text-align: justify;\">THE 4TH LOUD AZAN MAGHRIB IS IMMEDIATELY AFTER SUNSET</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; text-align: justify;\">THE 3RD AZAN ASR IS&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">SILENT</span></b>-- The Asr prayers can be performed till the sun is still bright and enough time of the day is left for a person to cover a distance of six miles</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; text-align: justify;\">THE LAST AZAN ISHA IS LOUD-- AND MUST BE STARTED ONLY AFTER --REPEAT --AFTER THE EVENING TWILIGHT IS OVER-- WHEN SUN IS&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">MORE THAN</span></b>&nbsp;6 DEGREES BELOW HORIZON</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; text-align: justify;\">Twilight is produced by sunlight scattering in the upper atmosphere, illuminating the lower atmosphere so that Earth's surface is neither completely lit nor completely dark.&nbsp;</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; text-align: justify;\">IT IS RIDICULOUS THAT A HINDU BLOGGER HAS TO TELL THIS</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; text-align: justify;\">THE ORIGINAL KORAN WRITTEN AT CHERMAN PERUMAL MOSQUE KODUNGALLUR LIES IN A FOX HOLE IN TIMBUKTOO. FRENCH ROTHSCHILD MERCENERIES TRIED TO BURN IT- THEY WERE NOT SUCCESSFUL</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; HOW HE CHEATED THE HINDUS... EVEN HIS FINAL WORDS \"HET RAM\" IS FAKE..<br />\n<br />\nGANDHIs MOTHER PUTALIBHAI WAS A JAIN, A FOLLOWER OF JAIN MONK BECHARJI SWAMI .. HER NEIGHBOUR WAS MY OFFICERs GREAT GRAND FATHER<br />\n<br />\nPREVIOUSLY WIKIPEDIA WROTE GANDHIs RELIGION AS \"JAIN\"<br />\n<br />\nTHEN IT BECAME \"HINDU WITH JAIN AFFILIATIONS\"<br />\n<br />\nNOW IT HAS DISAPPEARED..<br />\n<br />\nGandhi's personal guru was JAIN Shrimad Rajchandra.. Everybody knows this. Gandhi had written this several times..<br />\n<br />\nGandhi wrote about ROTHSCHILDs NON-VIOLENCE AGENT Shrimad Rajchandra in his autobiography, The Story of My Experiments with Truth, calling Raichandbhai his \"guide and helper\" and his \"refuge in moments of spiritual crisis\".<br />\n<br />\nShrimad Rajchandra, his mother, and wife stayed at JEW Aga Khan's bungalow in Ahmedabad..<br />\n<br />\nGANDHI USED TO BE THROWN INTO JAIL BY ROTHSCHILD OFTEN...<br />\n<br />\nGREAT PUBLICITY WAS GIVEN IN THE FRONT PAGES OF ALL NEWSPAPERS (MONOPOLISED BY ROTHSCHILD ) --OF GANDHI BRAVELY DEFYING THE BRITISH AND ENTERING JAIL..<br />\n<br />\nSAME NIGHT GANDHI WOULD BE WHISKED FROM JAIL IN GREAT SECRECY TO ONE OF JEW AGA KHANs PALACES NEARBY-- WHERE TWO UNDERAGE GIRLS WOULD BE WAITING WITH ENEMA KIT AND BLANKET..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/01/mahatma-gandhi-and-his-endless.html<br />\n<br />\nJEW AGHA KHAN WAS THE ONLY RELIGIOUS LEADER TO GET A GUN SALUTE FROM THE WHITE INVADER<br />\n<br />\nSAAAB KO CHOOTIYA BANAAYA..<br />\n<br />\nSir Sultan Muhammed Shah, Aga Khan III was the founder of ALL INDIA MUSLIM LEAGUE--which demanded the partition of India..<br />\n<br />\nThis JEW was the the first Honorary President of the Muslim League. JEW Sir Sultan Muhammed Shah, Aga Khan III was taken by Jew Rothschild in all three Round Table Conferences in London from 1930\u201332..<br />\n<br />\nRotshchild made JEW Agha Khan III the President of the League of Nations from 1937\u201338 --this org was the fore runner of UN--to carve out Israel.<br />\n<br />\nAga Khan's last three wives were JEWESSES--Cleope Teresa Magliano/ Andr\u00e9e Jos\u00e9phine Carron/ Yvonne Blanche Labrousse<br />\n<br />\nThe AIML party arose out of a literary movement begun at The Aligarh Muslim University in which JEW Syed Ahmad Khan was a central figure..<br />\n<br />\nThe principles of the League were espoused in the \"Green Book,\" which included the organisation's constitution, written by JEW Maulana Mohammad Ali. Mumbai's Muhammad Ali road is named after this JEW. I have seen his KOSHER grave in Jerusalem..<br />\n<br />\nOn 29 December 1930 JEW Sir Muhammad Iqbal delivered his monumental presidential address to the All India Muslim League annual session, demanding Pakistan.<br />\n<br />\nJinnah was a JEW. At a League conference in Lahore in 1940, Jinnah demanded Pakistan.<br />\n<br />\nBY 1947, ALL MAJOR MUSLIM KINGDOMS IN INDIA WERE RULED BY CRYPTO JEWS.<br />\n<br />\nMAJJA HAI-- KISSI KOH KUCH NAHIN PATHA.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c6043198391169861581\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL OWNED THE SHIVA TEMPLE KAABALISHWARA AT MECCA OASIS WHICH ALSO DOUBLED UP AS A SPICE FREE TRADE CUSTOMS OUTPOST ..<br /><br />146 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KAABA AT MECCA , THE HOLIEST PLACE OF THE MUSLIMS AND THIS PLANETs FIRST MOSQUE IS THE NAME OF LORD SHIVA AS GOD WITH THE MATTED LOCKS WHICH IS THE SOURCE OF THE GANGES..<br /><br />147 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KAABALA ( KABBALAH ) OF JUDAISM IS JUST A CORRUPTION OF KAABA + ISHAWARA ( KAABALISHAWARA ) ROOTED IN EIN SOF, THE ENDLESS ONE..<br /><br />148 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL RUSHED TO MECCA ON BEING SUMMONED BY EMERGENCY PIGEON MESSAGE BY THE KERALA NAMBOODIRI ARYAN PRIEST OF THE SHIVA TEMPLE AT MECCA OASIS , BY SHIP TO SALALAH ( PORT AT DHOFAR, HIS OWN KINGDOM ) AND THEN BY CARAVAN ROUTE ..<br /><br />149 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 DURING A FLOOD AT MECCA , THE SHIVA TEMPLE SHIVA LINGAM WAS SUBMERGED UNDER FIVE FEET OF WATER AND THE HINDU SON ( MOHAMMAD ) OF THE YOUNGER SEMITE NAMBOODIRI BROTHER IN CHARGE OF CUSTOMS/ TRADE , UPROOTED THE SHIVA LINGAM (BLASPHEMY ) AND FIXED IT ON THE SE CORNER OF THE TEMPLE STRUCTURE FIVE FEET ABOVE THE GROUND..<br /><br />150 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 IS SANATANA DHARMA WE BUILD A TEMPLE OVER A SPOT WHERE A SHIVA LINGAM ( BLACK METEORITE DIVINE PHALLUS STONE WHICH PROVIDES THE DNA SEED ) IS FOUND, THE STONE CANNOT BE LIFTED OFF THE GROUND AND FIXED AT AN ALTERNATE SPOT..<br /><br />151 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL REPORTEDLY CONVERTED TO ISLAM AFTER MEETING MOHAMMAD , AND DECREED THAT HIS SHIVA TEMPLE AT KODUNGALLUR HIS CULTURAL CENTRE BE CONVERTED TO A MOSQUE BY PIGEON MESSAGE ..<br /><br />152 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL DIED ( REPORTEDLY WAS KILLED ) ON HIS WAY BACK TO CALICUT , INDIA AND HIS DEAD BODY IS BURIED AT A ISLAMIC DARGAH AT SALALAH OMAN MARKED AS THIYYAJUDDIN , KING OF HINDU THIYYA CLAN.<br /><br />153 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THIS PLANETs FIRST PRISTINE KORAN WAS COMPILED AT KODUNGALLUR CHERAMAN PERUMAL MOSQUE A YEAR AFTER THE DEATH OF MOHAMMAD BY SEMITE YOUNGER BROTHERS OF NAMBOODIRIS UNDER THE CHARGE OF MOHAMMADs FRIEND AND DISCIPLE HINDU CONVERT MALIK BIN DINAR \u2026</span></b><br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2009/07/vedic-practises-in-mecca-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br /><br />CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c6043198391169861581-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c7822148748057008874\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 SIMPLEX CODE PRIME NUMBER 19 WAS ENMESHED INTO KORAN VERSES BY HINDU SAGES FROM KOUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY TO PREVENT FUDGING LATER BY JEWISH / CHRISTIAN ENEMIES OF ISLAM.. THESE UNGRATEFUL MUSLIMS NOW CALL HINDUS SAVAGES..<br /><br /><br />158 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THE VEDA SRUTI VERSES IN SANSKRIT HAD ITS OWN DIVINE MATH MULTIPLEX VERIFIERS .. VEDIC SRUTIS HAVE GOLDEN MEAN (1.618 ) , FIBONACCI SERIES , PASCALS TRIANGLE, LUCAS NUMBERS , SRI YANTRA ( GEOMETRY OF OM ), ULAM SPIRAL, PRIME NUMBER VERIFIER , ISOTOPE MAGIC EMBEDDED IN IT ..</span></b><br /><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span><br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">159- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THE ORIGINAL KORAN STILL HAND MADE IN CHERAMAN PERUMAL MOSQUE LIES HIDDEN IN A FOXHOLE UNDER TIMBUCTOO DESERT SANDS SAFE FROM FRENCH JEW ROTHSCHILDs MERCENERIES WHO TRIED TO DESTROY THE BOOK SEVERAL TIMES BY BURNING DOWN THE LIBRARY AT MALI..</span></b><br /><br />LIES WONT WORK.. A BROWN HINDU BLOGGER IS IN TOWN..<br /><br />I WILL NOT REVEAL THE FURTHER DETAILS OF&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">CODE 19&nbsp;</span></b>ENMESHED IN KORAN\u2014I WILL DO IT ONLY WHEN MY REVELATIONS REACH 98 %..<br /><br />IT SO HAPPENS THAT YOU TEACH SOME UNGRATEFUL BASTARD \u2013 AND LATER HE STARTS TEACHING YOU , WHAT HE LEARNT FROM YOU..<br /><br />Capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c7822148748057008874-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c7822148748057008874-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c806970617106005461\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. HE SAID HE KNEW BECAUSE SUCH ANIMALS AND BIRDS WERE FOUND ONLY IN INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nAURANGAZEBs SON WITH JEWESS UDAIPURI MAHAL WAS MUHAMMAD KAM BAKHSH-- HIS YOUNGEST AND LAST SON .<br />\n<br />\nFRENCH ROTHSCHILDs AGENT JEW THOMAS \"DIAMOND\" PITT GOT KING OF BIJAPUR MUHAMMAD KAM BAKHSH KILLED.<br />\n<br />\nDIAMOND ?<br />\n<br />\nJEW THOMAS PITT WAS GOVERNOR OF MADRAS ..<br />\n<br />\nPITT BABY STOLE A HUGE GOLCONDA DIAMOND.. INCLUDING PATRON FOUNDER SIR SYED AHMAN KHAN WHO WAS AN AGENT OF JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD USED HIS JEW AGENTS HIS HIGHNESS&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">SIR MOHAMMAD ALI MOHAMMAD KHAN AND AGHA KHAN III</span></b>&nbsp;AS FRONTS FOR FUND COLLECTION AND TO DO PROPAGANDA FOR AMU.<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD MADE CRYPTO JEW SIR MOHAMMAD ALI MOHAMMAD KHAN THE PRESIDENT OF ALL INDIA MUSLIM LEAGUE CONFERENCES FOR MORE THAN A DECADE.. HE WAS THE FIRST VC OF AMU..<br />\n<br />\nJEW SIR AGA KHAN WAS MADE THE PRO-CHANCELLOR OR AMU.<br />\n<br />\nJEWESS<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;KAIKHUSRAU JAHAN</span></b>&nbsp;, BEGUM OF BHOPAL WAS THE CHANCELLOR OF AMU. .. IMAGINE A WOMAN CHANCELLOR OF A MUSLIM UNIVERSITY--ONLY ROTHSCHILD COULD HAVE PULLED THAT OFF.<br />\n<br />\nEVEN BEFORE WORLD WAR 1 STARTED ROTHSCHILD MADE HER THE PRESIDENT OF ALL INDIA MUSLIM LEAGUE LADIES ASSOCIATION.. SHE WAS MADE DAME GRAND CROSS OF THE BRITISH EMPIRE.. BAAP REH !<br />\n<br />\nHER SON JEW&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">HAMIDULLAH KHAN&nbsp;</span></b>WAS AN AGENT OF ROTHSCHILD..HE WAS MADE CHANCELLOR OF THE CHAMBER OF PRINCES.&nbsp; &nbsp;SIR HAMIDULLAH KHAN HE WAS MADE CHANCELLOR OF AMU FOR 5 YEARS ..&nbsp; HAMIDULLAH KHANs GRAND DAUGHER WAS MARRIED TO NAWAB OF PATAUDI (&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">KAREENA KAPOORs FATHER-IN-LAW</span></b>&nbsp;)...<br />\n<br />\nJEW<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;SIR MUHAMMED IQBAL&nbsp;</span></b>( POET ) IS PAKISTANs NO 1 CITIZEN..<br />\n<br />\nAt Heidelberg Germany, one street ( at Marriott Hotel over looking river Neckar ) is named after Iqbal called IQBAL UFER-- thanks to German Jew Rothschild..Rothschild rewarded him for his role in pouring cold water over Muslim world anger over Palestine and ending the powerful Ottoman empire at Turkey.<br />\n<br />\nIqbal was first noticed by Rothschild , as a piece of clay to be molded, when he wrote something which surprised everybody.<br />\n<br />\nUpon the death of Queen Victoria in 1901, Dr. Iqbal penned an epicedium of ten pages, entitled \u201cTears of Blood \u201c.<br />\n<br />\nThe Queen died on the day of Eid-ul-Fitr, and Iqbal the slave wrote : ---<br />\n\"Happiness came, but grief came along with it,<br />\nYesterday was Eid, but today muharram<br />\n(Month of the year associated with the deepest mourning<br />\nfor Muslims) came.<br />\n<br />\n\"Easier than the grief and mourning of this day,<br />\nWould be the coming of the morn of the day of judgment.<br />\n<br />\n\"Ah! the Queen of the realm of the heart has passed away,<br />\nMy scarred heart has become a house of mourning.<br />\n<br />\n\"O India, thy lover has passed away,<br />\nShe who sighed at thy troubles has passed away.<br />\n<br />\n\"O India, the protective shadow of God has<br />\nbeen lifted from above you,<br />\nShe who sympathised with your inhabitants has gone.<br />\n<br />\n\"Victoria is not dead as her good name remains,<br />\nthis is the life to whomever God gives it.<br />\n<br />\n\"May the deceased receive abundant heavenly<br />\nreward, and may we show goodly patience.\"<br />\n<br />\n(Baqiyyat-i Iqbal, Poem runs over pages 71\u2013 90.)<br />\n<br />\nSOB--SOB--CRY--CRY!!<br />\n<br />\nIn December 1911, on the occasion of the coronation of King George V, Iqbal wrote and read out a poem entitled `Our King':<br />\n<br />\n\"It is the height of our good fortune,<br />\nThat our King is crowned today.<br />\n<br />\n\"By his life our peoples have honour,<br />\nBy his name our respect is established.<br />\n<br />\n\"With him have the Indians made a bond of loyalty,<br />\nOn the dust of his footsteps are our hearts sacrifced.\"<br />\n(Baqiyyat-i Iqbal, p. 206.)<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_172BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, Their numerals are called Hindu-Arabic even today.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">#####################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>Al Biruni<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">AL fuckin\u2019 BIRUNI STUDIED IN KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY AND TOOK ELABORATE NOTES WITH HIM -WITHOUT UNDERSTANDING, AS HE WAS NOT VERY BRIGHT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Al-Biruni was a Sanskrit scholar who learnt Math and astronomy in from Namboodiri professors adept in Sanskrit and Arabic .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Let me quote Wikipedia -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">QUOTE: Al-Biruni wrote an encyclopedic work on India called \u201cTarikh Al-Hind\u201d (History of India) in which he explored nearly every aspect of Indian life, including religion, history, geography, geology, science, and mathematics. My book is nothing but a simple historic record of facts. I shall place before the reader the theories of the Hindus exactly as they are, and I shall mention in connection with them similar theories of the Greeks in order to show the relationship existing between them.(1910, Vol. 1, p. 7;1958, p. 5)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Hindus considered Muslims violent and impure, and did not want to share anything with him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Over time, Al-Biruni won the welcome of Hindu scholars. Al-Biruni collected books and studied with these Hindu scholars to become fluent in Sanskrit, discover and translate into Arabic the mathematics, science, medicine, astronomy and other fields of arts as practiced in 11th century India. He was inspired by the arguments offered by Indian scholars who believed earth must be ellipsoid shape, with yet to be discovered continent at earth's south pole, and earth's rotation around the sun is the only way to fully explain the difference in daylight hours by latitude, seasons and earth's relative positions with moon and stars.[36] Al-Biruni was also critical of Indian scribes who he believed carelessly corrupted Indian documents while making copies of older documents.[37] Al-Biruni's translations as well as his own original contributions reached Europe in 12th and 13th century, where they were actively sought.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">CONTINUED TO 2--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">While others were killing each other over religious differences, Al-Biruni had a remarkable ability to engage Hindus in peaceful dialogue. Mohammad Yasin puts this dramatically when he says, \u201cThe Indica is like a magic island of quiet, impartial research in the midst of a world of clashing swords, burning towns, and burned temples.\u201d (Indica is another name for Al-Biruni\u2019s history of India). (Yasin, 1975, p. 212). :UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Al-Biruni</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">############################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>Ibn al-haytham<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Ibn fuckin\u2019 al-Haytham or Alhazen has been made out to be the first theoretical physicists, -- a system where a hypothesis must be proved by mathematical evidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Alhazen\u2019s ( Ibn al-Haytham) science of optics is not his own. He just lifted and patented.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">As regards Alzhazen\u2019s OPTICS, the wolrd must know we Indians were masters in TOTAL INTERNAL REFLECTION \u2013 the ultimate in optics<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/total-internal-reflection-capt-ajit.html</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Ptolemy stole from the astronomical data from Surya Siddhanta . The white historians had the gall to LIE that Varahamihira 2660 BC stole from Ptolemy of 155 AD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">He went back and patented SWASTIKA ( dhruv / Polaris and sapt rishis/ great bear ) in his own name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">We never affixed author\u2019s names on our books of knowledge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Kodungallur university BLACK BALLED all stealing Greeks . And ancient Greek knowledge suddenly dried up like water in the hot desert sands..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">##########################################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>Muhammad ibn Zakariya al-Razi<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Muhammad fuckin\u2019 ibn Zakariya al-Razi studied in Kodungallur University in 886 AD. He left behind several translated to Arabic manuscripts on medicine and surgery ( Al Mansuri ) and astronomy. This knowledge of Susruta and Charaka was sold to him for gold . All the manuscripts he left behind were ready made translated knowledge from Kodungllur university ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">###############################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>Nasir al-Din al-Tusi<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Nasir al-Din fuckin\u2019 al-Tusi studied in Kodungallur University in 1260 AD. He is called the father of Trigonometry This is nonsense . He was NOT a bright student and he was given translated Math knowledge ( Kit\u0101b al-Shakl al-qatt\u0101 ) from the Kerala school of Math in exchange for gold. , serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Muhammad ibn Musa al-Khwarizmi</b></span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Mathematician Muhammad ibn fuckin\u2019 Musa al-Khwarizmi studied in Kodungallur University in Kerala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Fibonacci took his Arabic works to Italy from Bejaya , Algeria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">ALGEBRA is derived from Al-Jabr, one of the two operations he used to solve quadratic equations. Algorism and algorithm stem from Algoritmi, the Latin form of his name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Let me quote wikipedia:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">QUOTE- Ibn al-Nad\u012bm's Kit\u0101b al-Fihrist includes a short biography on al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b together with a list of the books he wrote. Al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b accomplished most of his work in the period between 813 and 833. After the Muslim conquest of Persia, Baghdad became the centre of scientific studies and trade, and many merchants and scientists from as far as China and India traveled to this city, as did al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b. He worked in Baghdad as a scholar at the House of Wisdom established by Caliph al-Ma\u2019m\u016bn, where he studied the sciences and mathematics, which included the translation of Greek and Sanskrit scientific manuscripts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b's Z\u012bj al-Sindhind[11] (Arabic: \u0632\u064a\u062c \u0627\u0644\u0633\u0646\u062f \u0647\u0646\u062f\u200e, \"astronomical tables of Sindh and Hind\") is a work consisting of approximately 37 chapters on calendrical and astronomical calculations and 116 tables with calendrical, astronomical and astrological data, as well as a table of sine values. This is the first of many Arabic Zijes based on the Indian astronomical methods known as the sindhind.[22] The work contains tables for the movements of the sun, the moon and the five planets known at the time. This work marked the turning point in Islamic astronomy. Hitherto, Muslim astronomers had adopted a primarily research approach to the field, translating works of others and learning already discovered knowledge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">-UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">LIES WONT WORK ANYMORE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">FROM 800 AD TO 1450AD KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING EARNED HUGE AMOUNT OF GOLD FOR SELLING READY MADE TRANSLATED KNOWLEDGE ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">OF COURSE IT WAS NOT AS MUCH FORTUNE AS MADE BY TRADING SPICES..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; BECAUSE HINDUS NOW WILL NOT BE COWARDS ANYMORE AND WILL GIVE BACK AS GOOD AS THEY GET..<br />\n<br />\n800 YEARS OF SLAVERY IS NOT FORGOTTEN BY HINDUS..DURING ISLAM INVADERS RULE HINDUS WERE TREATED WORSE THAN SHIT..<br />\n<br />\nIt was a mob of more than 1500 persons \u2013 almost all Ghanchi Muslims who set fire to coach S-6 of Sabarmati express at Godhra.<br />\n<br />\nFake stories were cooked up that the Karsevaks tried to abduct a Ghanchi Muslim girl from Godhra railway station .<br />\n<br />\nMore than 2100 muslims were involved in this massacre , awaiting with jerry cans of kerosene and petrol -- even before the train bearing ayodhya kar sevaks steamed in to godra station -- as the train was 5 hours late .<br />\n<br />\nNo train station is ever so crowded at 0745 hrs in the morning . Petrol and Kerosene is NOT available in this manner inside a railway station..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WERE MORE THAN 4000 LIVE WITNESSES TO WHAT TRANSPIRED .<br />\n<br />\nThe over crowded train itself had more than 2200 kar sevaks coming back after Ram Yagna at Ayodhya , and some of them got down at godra . The train was pelted with stones for a full 15 minutes before the fire was thrown through the broken windows .<br />\n<br />\nThe train had left the platform and was stopped by pulling the cabin at a secluded place few hundred metres from the Godra platform, at a Ghanchi Muslim slum .<br />\n<br />\nIn 1948, Ghanchi Muslims were the dominant sect in Godhra.<br />\n<br />\nGhanchis are well-known for their aggressive and impulsive reaction to the slightest provocation..<br />\n<br />\nMY SHIP WAS AT JEDDAH WHEN GODHRA RIOTS HAPPENED .<br />\n<br />\nA SAUDI PRINCE CAME N TV AND A WABABBI MULLAH WAS TRYING HARD TO GET HIM TO COMMIT-- THAT HINDUS ARE TERRORISTS<br />\n<br />\nTHE PRINCE CUT HIM OFF- HE SAID \" THE GODHRA INCIDENT WAS REVENGE FOR 31 INNOCENT WOMAN AND 12 CHILDREN BEING BURNT ALIVE INSIDE A TRAIN COMPARTMENT BY MUSLIMS -- WHAT IS WRONG WITH THAT ? \"<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/babri-masjid-demolition-mughal-emperor.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAfter several years of inquiry by several eminent men , the bastards came to the conclusion that the kar servaks in the railway compartment, on the way back from ayodhya , died in an ACCIDENTAL fire , of their own creation at Godhra station.<br />\n<br />\nAfter the godra riots -- they found hundreds of stone pelt marks outside the compartment and stones inside the compartment --<br />\n<br />\n----thousands of LIVE witnesses -- yet the enquiry commission of the ITALIAN waitress declared\u2014HINDU WOMEN USED STOVES INSIDE THE COMPARTMENT S6 TO COOK AND CAUSED THE FIRE.<br />\n<br />\nSince 2002 they main stream media tried to portray Modi as a murderer . The Italian waitress called Modi --MAUTH KE SAUDAGAR ( merchant of death )..<br />\n<br />\nNone of the TV channels or media ever said , even once , that if the godra train massacre did NOT take place , the 2002 riots also would NOT have taken place .<br />\n<br />\nThey acted as if 2002 riots were pre-meditated and NOT a knee jerk retaliation--under extreme provocation .<br />\n<br />\nThe entire main stream media and TV CONDONED the roasting alive of 59 people on 27th Feb 2002-- since the past 14 years .<br />\n<br />\n302 INNOCENT HINDUS WERE SLAUGHTERED BY MUSLIMS DURING THE POST-GODHRA RIOTS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE HINDU DEATH TOLL IN 2002 GUJARAT RIOTS , INCREASED BECAUSE BARKHA DUTT AND HER MUSLIM CAMERA MAN JAMI UPLOADED A ( PLANTED ) BURNT KORAN PAGE ON NDTV . THEY COME BACK HOME HIGHLY STRESSED .. THE IS NO CATHARSIS PROVIDED BY THROWING STONES ON 3 SHAITANS ( BRAHMA/ VISHNU AND SHIVA )..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nIN ANCIENT DAYS IT WAS THREE IDOLS --TODAY REPLACED BY 3 PILLARS.. MOHAMMAD THE PROPHET NEVER SANCTIONED THIS MANDATORY ISLAMIC HAJ RITUAL .. THESE ARE FAKE HADITHS INSERTED BY JEWS..<br />\n<br />\nSTONING IS NOT PART OF THE HOLY KORAN.. THE ORIGINAL KORAN WAS A NOBLE DOCUMENT--WE COMPILED IT IN KERALA, CHERAMAN PERUMAL MOSQUE IN KODUNGALLUR ( THIS PLANETs SECOND MOSQUE )..<br />\n<br />\nSINCE THIS STONING RITUAL STARTED THOUSANDS OF HAJ PILGRIMS HAD DIED --&nbsp; DUE TO INHERENT RAGE AND STAMPEDES. MORE THAN 49 STONES ARE REQUIRED IN CASE THE PILGRIMS STAY IN MINA FOR ONE MORE DAY..<br />\n<br />\nThe stampede during the Haj of 2006 killed at least more than 508 pilgrims and injured more than 342..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">On September 24, 2015 in Mina when at least 9106 pilgrims were killed.. In Saudi if you quote this true figure you will be killed and buried in the sands.</span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\nTHREE TIMES MORE PILGRIMS GO TO SABARIMALA THAN HAJ-- THERE IS NEVER A CRUSH ..THE 18 STEPS IS A NARROW BOTTLE NECK..<br />\n<br />\nTHE STONING AT HAJ STARTED RECENTLY ( INTRODUCED BY THE AL SAUD JEWISH BLOODLINE ) \u2013 NOT IN THE LIFETIME OF THE PROPHET<br />\n<br />\nThough it is written in the hadith that Mohammad stoned the shaitans after his noon prayers .<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">These three stone idols were stolen along with the black shiva lingam at the SE corner of the Kaaaba Mecca by Qarmatian leader Abu Tahir al-Qarmati.</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">After much bloodshed , and a ransom paid ( for the stone ) , the stone was returned twenty-three years later, in 952 AD, but in 7 pieces.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">Somebody came threw a bundle and vanished. 7 pieces of black stone was wrapped in a sack and thrown into the Friday Mosque of Kufa, accompanied by a note saying \"By command we took it, and by command we have brought it back.\"</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">\n</span>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">\n<div>\nThis returned stone weighed very light and when put in fresh water it floated. This was just a black pumice stone with gas pockets found at high heat volcanoes and is the current cemented stone 5 feet above the ground at the Kaaba.. The original Shiva Lingam would weigh more than steel of same volume.</div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<div>\nThis is what exists even today. This stone has been X-Rayed by the British&nbsp;.</div>\n</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/11/the-sack-of-somnath-temple-by-mahmud-of.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe stolen TRINITY idols were replaced by 3 pillars. In all Kaabalishwara temples Shiva is worshipped ?<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kapaleeshwarar_Temple</span><br />\n<br />\nThe above temple is more than 3000 years old-not 1300 years as told by Wikipedia.<br />\n<br />\nThe rest of the post is POISON injected by the white invader-<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: The temple's name is derived from the words kapalam (head) and eeshwarar an alias of lord Shiva. According to the Puranas, during the meeting of Brahma and Shiva at top of Mount Kailash Brahma failed to show the due respect to Shiva. Due to this, Shiva plucked of one of Brahma's heads (kapalams). In an act of penance, Brahma came down to the site of Mylapore and installed a Lingam to please Shiva.\u201dUNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nKAPALI is matted hair.<br />\n<br />\nSTONING OF THE SHAITAN IS NOT A RITUAL THAT MUST BE PERFORMED DURING HAJ PILGRIMAGE AS PER KORAN OR EVEN HADITH<br />\n<br />\nAAA- These rituals are acts of worship and must be dedicated to the name of God alone (6:162).<br />\n<br />\nWHO HAS TOLD MUSLIMS TO DEDICATE SOMETHING TO THE DEVIL DURING A HOLY PILGRIMAGE -- WITH A NEGATIVE CONNOTATION ? THIS RITUAL NEVER EXISTED IN ANCIENT TIMES -- MOHAMMAD KISSED THE BLACK STONE , HE DID NOT DO THE JAMRAH STONING.<br />\n<br />\nThere is a black meterorite stone at the SE corner of kaaba 5 feet above the ground- installed by mohammad the prophet himself , with his own hands.<br />\n<br />\nBBB-<br />\n\"Ibn `Abbas (may Allah be pleased with him) reported that the Prophet (peace and blessings be upon him) said: \"The Black Stone came down from Jannah (Paradise).\"<br />\n<br />\n(At-Tirmidhi, Sunan, hadith no. 877, and classified as authentic hadith by Sheikh Al-Albaani in his book Sahih At-Tirmidthi, hadith no. 695 )<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCCC-<br />\n<br />\n\"Narrated 'Abis bin Rabia: 'Umar came near the Black Stone and kissed it and said \"No doubt, I know that you are a stone and can neither benefit anyone nor harm anyone. Had I not seen Allah's Apostle kissing you I would not have kissed you.\"<br />\n<br />\nSahih Bukhari 2:26:667, also Sahih Bukhari 2:26:657 and Sahih Muslim 7:2912-2915<br />\n<br />\nDDD-<br />\n\"Ibn `Umar (may Allah be pleased with him) quoted the Prophet (peace and blessings be upon him) as saying: \u201cTouching them both [the Black Stone and Ar-Rukn Al-Yamani] is an expiation for one\u2019s sins.\"<br />\n<br />\n(At-Tirmidhi, Sunan, hadith no. 959. This hadith is classified as hasan by At-Tirmidhi and as Sahih by Al-Hakim (1/664), and Adh-Dhahabi agreed with him.)<br />\n<br />\ntoday nobody can touch the black stone due to great crush at a single point. they can only point their hand towards it while doing circum ambulation 7 times anti-clockwise. ( pradikshanam )<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">STONING OF THE DEVIL IS NOT IN THE KORAN OR IN ANY ORIGINAL HADITH . He and his tribe see you from where you cannot see them.\" 7:27<br />\n<br />\nThe Quran emphasises that the only duty of believers in the Hajj is to commemorate the name of God. Then he would go ahead until he reached the level ground where he would stand facing the qiblah, and he stood for a long time, offering du\u2019aa\u2019 and raising his hands. Then he would stone the middle pillar, then he would move to the left towards the middle ground, where he would stand facing the qiblah. He would remain there for a long time offering du\u2019aa\u2019 and raising his hands. Then he would stone Jamarat al-\u2018Aqabah from the middle of the valley, but he did not stand beside it. Then he would leave and say: This is how I saw the Prophet doing it. ----Narrated by al-Bukhaari (1751)\u2026<br />\n<br />\nALMOST ALL TOP MUSLIM CLERGY TODAY GET JEWISH FUNDS.. REST ALL ILL TREAT THE MALAYALIS WHO BUILT THEIR NATIONS FROM THE SANDS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_DEDx_sdG90</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">MIND YOU , PART OF OMAN WAS OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING ( STATE OF DHOFAR WITH CAPITAL AT SALALAH )..</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CALICUT KING OWNED SALALAH PORT.. HE HAD HUGE GODOWNS WHERE SPICES WERE STORED , AS DURING MONSOONS SHIPPING WAS IMPOSSIBLE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">FROM SALALAH THE SPICES WENT OVERLAND BY CAMEL BACK TO PALESTINE FROM WHERE ROTHSCHILDs SHIPS TOOK IT TO EUROPE..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ARABS WERE MIDDLE MEN WHO RAN THE CAMEL CARAVANS .. MOHAMMAD THE PROPHETs FIRST WIFE WAS A HINDU MAPPILA CARAVAN OWNER..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vq0Ac-WI_1U</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CALICUT KINGs SHIPS WENT TO GWADAR ( IN PAKISTAN ) FROM WHERE SPICES WENT ON OVERLAND ROUTE TO GEORGIA ROTHSCHILDs SHIPS THEN TOOK IT TO CONSTANTINOPLE AND EUROPE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEWS AS SHIPPERS FROM PALESTINE ( ISRAEL )) AND GEORGIA MADE MONEY AS MIDDLEMEN.. THEY SAT ON THEIR KOSHER ASSES AND MADE MONEY.. THIS IS WHY ISRAEL AND GEORGIA IS FULL OF JEWS EVEN TODAY..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">ROTHSCHILDs COMMUNISM WAS THE REASON WHY THERE ARE NO INDUSTRIES IN AN INTELLIGENT PLENTIFUL LAND LIKE KERALA.. KERALA STRIKES AND BANDHs WERE CONTROLLED FROM ABROAD..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MALAYALIS HAD TO MIGRATE FOR JOBS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">SAME WAY JEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED DELIBERATE FAMINE IN NORTH INDIA TO FORCE ENTIRE FAMILIES TO MIGRATE TO FOREIGN LANDS TO WORK IN SUGARCANE PLANTATIONS..</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/04/indentured-coolie-slavery-reinvented.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">COMMIE CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN \" BOURGEOIS, PROLETARIAT AUR COMMON MINIMUM PROGRAM\" KA VISHAY MAIN CONFUSE HO GAYA - AND HE HAS SELF DESTRUCTED OVER THE SABARIMALA ISSUE.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; NOT FEAR..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CAPTAIN PINARAYI VIJAYAN WOULD BE KNIFED BY THE FILIPINO CREW WITHIN 24 HOURS AND THROWN OVERBOARD.. INDOCTRINATION CLASSES HAPPEN TO A DRUGGED MASS AUDIENCE ..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">WITH FENTANYL YOU CAN INJECTS DISNFORMATION INTO THE SUBCONSCIOUS BRAIN.</span></div>\n<br />\nSUICIDE BOMBERS ARE SELECTED FROM HOMOSEXUALS WHO HAVE NO SELF WORTH.. THESE SELECTED FIDAYEENS ARE PROVIDED ANAL SEX WITH SMALL MADRASSA BOYS ..<br />\n<br />\nIF THEY ARE ANAL SEX RECEIVING TYPE ( MORE THAN 65 % ) THERE ARE HARDCORE TERRORISTS ( NON-SUICIDE SQUAD ) WHO PROVIDE THIS..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE REASON WHY MADRASSAS ARE PART AND PARCEL OF EVERY ISLAMIC TERRORIST CAMP. DOCTORS WHO SPECIALIST IN SEXUAL DISEASES OF ANUS / PENIS ARE PART OF THIS CAMP..<br />\n<br />\nLTTE ( TAMIL SUICIDE SQUADS ) DID NOT NEED DRUGS--THEY WERE FUELED BY TAMIL PRIDE AND PERSECUTION MANIA IDEOLOGY .. MOST OF THEM WERE PEACEFUL PEOPLE BEFORE.<br />\n<br />\nLTTE TERRORISM HAD A ROOT CAUSE.. ARROGANT BUDDHIST SR LANKAN AIRFORCE SPRAYED TAMIL VILLAGES WITH AERATED SHIT.. THIS WOUNDED THE PSYCHE OF THE SIMPLE TAMILS WHO GET HYPER EMOTIONAL UNLIKE OTHER STATES OF INDIA ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/08/aidmk-dmk-misplaced-support-for-ltte.html<br /><br />http://mackenzieinstitute.com/carfentanil-street-drug-weapon-mass-destruction-available-canadian-streets/</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">FENTANYL IS FLOWING INTO PUNJAB FROM PAKISTAN..DOGS CANNOT SNIFF IT..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">YOUNG GIRLS ARE MULE CARRIERS USING THE STRINGENT POSCO LAWS OF INDIA TO ADVANTAGE.. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_10.html?showComment=1552313516782#c991276563145692525\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 11, 2019 at 7:41 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME--<br />\n<br />\nHOW DO I KNOW THE INSIDE WORKING OF TERROR CAMPS<br />\n<br />\nI HAD A JUNIOR ENGINEER WHO HAD DONE ISLAMIC STUDIES IN PAKISTAN/ IRAN/ KANDAHAR<br />\n<br />\nONVE WHEN I WENT TO HIS CABIN FOR INSPECTIONS-- HE WAS IN THE ENGINE ROOM.<br />\n<br />\nI USED THE MASTER KEY AND ENTERED.. CHIEF OFFICER OPENED OUT A KORAN ON HIS BED AND INSIDE THE COVER WAS WRITTEN \" DEATH TO ISRAEL.. DEATH TO USA \"..<br />\n<br />\nHE WAS A HANDSOME GUY, CLEAN AT HEART..<br />\n<br />\nHE BECAME MY FAN AND WOULD DISCUSS THE KORAN WITH ME -- THINGS WHICH HIS ISLAMIC TEACHERS ( WHO JUST KNEW ARABIC ) COULD NOT ADDRESS.<br />\n<br />\nONE DAY HE TOLD ME-- CAPTAIN SAAB, I HAVE HEAVY CLOUT IN PAKISTAN.. ANYTIME YOU SHIP COMES TO PAKISTAN, JUST GIVE ME A RING, I WILL GET YOU OUT OF THE PORT GATES WITH PROPER IMMIGRATION PASS AND TAKE YOU WHERE EVER YOU WANT TO GO IN PAKISTAN PERSONALLY..<br />\n<br />\nONE DAY , HE SHOWED ME HIS WOULD BE WIFEs PHOTO..<br />\n<br />\nA VERY BEAUTIFUL WOMAN<br />\n<br />\nSHE WAS A HARDCORE ISLAMIC PREACHER ( FOR RADICALIZING ISLAMIC WOMEN )..<br />\n<br />\nI CONVINCED HIM THAT HE SHOULD MARRY A WOMAN WHO LOVES HIM ( NOT ISLAM ), WHO CAN MAKE HIM SMILE, WHO WILL COOK FOR HIM, MAKE HIS HOUSE A HOME AND TAKE CARE OF HIS FUTURE CHILDREN..<br />\n<br />\nHE DID THAT .. SUCH WAS MY INFLUENCE ON HIM..<br />\n<br />\nI DID NOT USE DRUGS TO REVERSE BRAINWASH HIM.. JUST LOGOS..<br />\n<br />\nLATER ON ANOTHER SHIP A PAKISTANI CHIEF OFFICER TOLD ME.. HE KNEW THIS GUY..<br />\n<br />\nONE DAY THE PAKISTANI AIRPORT CUSTOMS CONFISCATED SOMETHING HE DID NOT DECLARE..<br />\n<br />\nHE WITNESSED HIM TELLING THE TOP AIRPORT CUSTOMS OFFICER-- IN 24 HOURS YOU WILL PERSONALLY DELIVER THIS ITEM IN MY HOME.. AND WALKED OFF. HE SAYS THE CUSTOMS GUY BECAME ASHEN FACED...<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"></span><br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c3499858154262815009\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 17.6px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. THE FIERCE GUARD IN UNIFORM STANDING OVER HIM, TOLD HIM TO STOP.. HE DID NOT.. HE CONTINUED RUBBING.<br />\n<br />\nHE FURIOUS GUARD BEAT HIM BADLY WITH THE WHIP-- THE WHIP END TORE HIS CLOTHES AND RIPPED HIS SKIN, STILL HE CONTINUED.. text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_G6-ZWJJEmk/UWGFg_hHBqI/AAAAAAAAhNU/RrkMf_4xkNo/s1600/6a00e39823366888330105362d9dff970b-320wi.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kolam is an Indian art\nform of drawing designs with rice flour. &nbsp;Kolam is seen adorning the doorsteps of every\ntraditional Hindu home in southern India.&nbsp;\nMillions of south Indian women get up before sunrise , clean the area in\nfront of their main gate and then wash the place by sprinkling water.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then they\ntake a bath and draw intricate designs with rice powder. &nbsp;These created patterns have been passed on\ngeneration to generation, from mothers to daughters. &nbsp;Today the modern women neglect to do this, as\nthey do NOT know what this is all about.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They are drawn &nbsp;around a grid of 108 dots , which serve as the\nskeletal structure for the kolam. .&nbsp;\nLines are drawn, connecting the dots or around them, very often in a\nsingle, continuous curve. As soon as the job is done small birds start eating\nthe rice powder, and they are NOT shooed away. . &nbsp;In the ancient days Kolam designs had fixed\nrules that result in intriguing patterns using line, dots, circles, squares,\ntriangles.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Kolam is a visible sound mantra--</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>outside the human audio range. </b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>If &nbsp;you punch KOLAM into Google search , you will get 46 millions posts.
