line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes they would share a beer with him and\nit was usual for him to make this mournful statement after a wholesome swig of beer with a loud sigh \u201c You\nguys are so lucky. In my time we ate grams and survived\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After some time this\ndialogue got on their nerves and so the students conspired to end this type of\na melancholy statement, which went against his jovial nature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So the next time he\nmade this statement, all the boys got up and said \u201c Sir, we are so lucky to\nhave a nice master like you. We want to touch your feet!\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And they all rushed\ntowards him , all trying to catch his feet. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So far so good.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In between one boy said\n\u201c Give me some space, I cant see his feet. OK, then I will hold his balls\u201d and\nthen he squeezed it at bit hard -- a most sensitive twin spot \u201c. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After this incident\nevery time he started off with \u201c You guys are so luc----\u201c &nbsp;he would hold on to his balls and look at the\nnaughty boys and not say the balance part of \u201c in my time we ate grams and\nsurvived \u201c<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AXmsAfPNnmk/UVbD3lUIbRI/AAAAAAAAhF0/QWJdzZYlTus/s1600/VGHJOK.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AXmsAfPNnmk/UVbD3lUIbRI/AAAAAAAAhF0/QWJdzZYlTus/s1600/VGHJOK.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I remember when I was a\nsmall boy , we had a school project of sprouting beans and writing an essay\nabout it. I had no dang idea , so my father helped me out. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He showed me two ways. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In one I can watch it\nsprouting by using a shaped up blotting paper , which held the beans , inserted\ninto a glass having water.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The other way was to\nsoak the beans in water and then fold it up in a wet cotton cloth and leave it\nlying in a bowl.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So I asked him, how he\nknow this- as he seemed to be an expert. &nbsp;My father was a member of RSS in the\npre-independence days.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-8swohclvQsE/UVZ7HLySmVI/AAAAAAAAhFE/gh9os3o86s0/s1600/downloadkjg.g.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"268\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-8swohclvQsE/UVZ7HLySmVI/AAAAAAAAhFE/gh9os3o86s0/s400/downloadkjg.g.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He told me about the Indian\nNavy Mutiny in 1946, &nbsp;when RSS has put\nroad blocks in all major cities of India , to prevent British troop movement. &nbsp;After this mutiny till India became\nindependent RSS would hold massive shows of strength like mass drills , march\npasts etc every day. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They would march past\nthe British bungalows in Calicut . &nbsp;A lot\nof people in the group used to be ex-soldiers of World War 2 who were disbanded\nafter the war. &nbsp;This sort of weakened the\nBritish resolve to hold on to India. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me narrate my\nfather\u2019s RSS method.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AAA ) Use only good quality\nseeds for sprouting. &nbsp;Sit in bright day\nlight , put your spectacles on if you need them, and eliminate every bean which\nlooks suspicious or not upto the mark in looks.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A single bad bean will contaminate\na whole batch of sprouts, &nbsp;so show no\nmercy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Clean and wash the moong\nbeans . </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is to remove any\npesticides. Make sure they are organic and not GM beans, which will give you\ncancer.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soak it overnight or\nfor 8 hours. &nbsp;Make sure the beans are\ncompletely submerged in good quality non-chlorinated water , even when they get\nswollen with water ingress. &nbsp;Don\u2019t be\nstingy with water at this phase.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">BBB ) On the second\nday-</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rinse the swollen beans\nwell and drain the water. &nbsp;Some would\nhave even started sprouting. Drain the water completely by hanging off the\nbeans in a thin white cotton cloth .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now, &nbsp;keep the cloth along with the moong beans in a\nvessel at room temperature. &nbsp;Cover it\nwith a light lid and leave it overnight undisturbed. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Make sure the cloth is damp and care should be\ntaken to ensure that there is no water stagnant in the vessel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-81iIErAtv1A/UVa5EoDW4vI/AAAAAAAAhFk/lJvANP1P7eE/s1600/8444428494_b2d0a7a3ea_o.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">DDD ) On the third day--</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can see that the seeds have sprouted well.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you want longer\nsprouts, rinse and drain the beans through the cloth and keep it for another 6\nhours. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again ensure that the cloth is\ndamp and also there should be no stagnant water in the vessel , lest the\nsprouted </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">beans get rotten and slimy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\nis good to place the spouted beans in direct sunlight to allow the UV light to\nkill any bacteria or fungus , before you start making a salad out of it.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is easy to make\nsprouts in summer than winter.&nbsp; The main\nfactors for germination are water, air, heat , and darkness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There or no\ngermination at all if any of these factors are not present such as insufficient\nwater, or too much water, lack of sufficient heat, lack of fresh air, either\ntoo cold or too hot surroundings and too much light. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moong beans can be sprouted either in light or\ndark conditions. Those sprouted in the dark will be crisper in texture . Those\nsprouted in slight daylight light will have more nutritional content than those\ngrown in absolute darkness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you are not going to\nuse it immediately, it can be kept in the refrigerator for 3 days, packed\nloosely . Do not consume after 3 days even if they look good as germinating\nseeds are fertile ground for harmful bacterial growth...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sprouts are a cheap\nmethod of obtaining a potent concentration of protein, vitamins, minerals and\nenzymes. Moong sprouts probably contain the largest amount of nutrients per\nunit of any food known. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eating sprouts\nis the safest and best way of getting the advantage of complete nutrition for\nit is LIVE organic food. &nbsp;It is the\nsafest and best way of getting the advantage of both fruits and vegetables\nwithout contamination and harmful insecticides.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7WoOPa-fOXk/UVa4wIWp9sI/AAAAAAAAhFc/teVUJuJeaCM/s1600/3ey6u.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moong beans belong to\nthe pea family , of the Indian Vigna radiate. &nbsp;This native plant of India It has been cultivated\nand consumed as a sprout for more than 9000 years, when the rest of the world\ndid NOT know the meaning of cultivation, and were clubbing down animals for\nfood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">When the moong bean is sprouted,\nthere is a tremendous increase in nutrients as compared to the dried embryo. &nbsp;The vitamins, minerals and protein content\nsubstantially increase with a simultaneous decrease in caloric and carbohydrate\ncontent. &nbsp;Pulses and seeds show a very\nlow water content. &nbsp;This, however, tends\nto increase tenfold when converted into sprouts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Holi is the greatest leveler\nin India, where an ordinary Jawan can walk up to a General and spray colour on\nhim and the General reciprocates by putting colour on the Jawan and hugging him.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Enemies have heart to heart talks\nand &nbsp;make up on this day. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ubyJ45XH5N4/UVOL8hZp20I/AAAAAAAAg-Q/5jOpcT-WnoU/s1600/bntru6r.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"268\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ubyJ45XH5N4/UVOL8hZp20I/AAAAAAAAg-Q/5jOpcT-WnoU/s400/bntru6r.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Holi is celebrated on\nthe day after the full moon in early March and glorifies good harvest and\nfertility of the land . &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">RADHA IS A FAKE BACK DATED CREATION OF THE WHITE INVADER. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">BEFORE THE WHITE MAN CAME TO INDIA NOBODY HEARD OF RADHA , THE MISTRESS OF LORD KRISHNA&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white man wrote that Holi is\ncelebrated in memory of the immortal love of Lord Krishna and Radha. &nbsp;The young Krishna would complain to his mother\nYashoda about why Radha was so fair and he so dark.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OSls11c2-JM/UVOH_nv6_4I/AAAAAAAAg94/9xYB_nHZBM8/s1600/imagesB,;UH.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"274\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OSls11c2-JM/UVOH_nv6_4I/AAAAAAAAg94/9xYB_nHZBM8/s400/imagesB,;UH.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yashoda\nadvised him to apply colour on Radha's face and see how her complexion would\nchange.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">TRUTH: &nbsp;In the legends of Krishna as a\nyouth he is depicted playing all sorts of pranks with the gopis or\ncowgirls.&nbsp; One prank was to throw colored water all over them.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3hfSNOtr1OM/UVOssF7AWLI/AAAAAAAAhBg/yEnExxFXB5Q/s1600/DSC09060KrishnaHoliBig.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"245\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3hfSNOtr1OM/UVOssF7AWLI/AAAAAAAAhBg/yEnExxFXB5Q/s400/DSC09060KrishnaHoliBig.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So at Holi, images\nof Krishna and his consort Radha are often carried through the streets . The\ncolors of Holi, called 'gulal', in the medieval times were made at home, from\nthe flowers of the 'tesu' or 'palash' tree, also called 'the flame of the\nforest'.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Df5LwpTKUso/UVOMfMX_72I/AAAAAAAAg-s/5BScBYHqWD4/s1600/imagesjhfgc.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"284\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Df5LwpTKUso/UVOMfMX_72I/AAAAAAAAg-s/5BScBYHqWD4/s400/imagesjhfgc.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These flowers, bright red or\ndeep orange in color, were collected from the forest and spread out on mats, to\ndry in the sun, and then ground to fine dust.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3dQXLKdN8so/UVONs2BqvFI/AAAAAAAAg_A/635rfzlmWxk/s1600/imagesrhjl.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"265\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3dQXLKdN8so/UVONs2BqvFI/AAAAAAAAg_A/635rfzlmWxk/s400/imagesrhjl.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The powder when mixed with water made a beautiful saffron-red dye. This\npigment and also 'aabir', made from natural colored talc, which were\nextensively used as Holi colors, are good for the skin.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\">This year the foreign\nfunded media has been lying in ambush for the Holi celebrations of</span><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"> Asaram Bapu</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\">.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Negative ions attach itself to it and enlarges the virus.&nbsp; Viruses are so tiny that our lungs cant pull\nthem out, unless they are enlarged. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-aTEsShLjFw4/UVOR-ga19kI/AAAAAAAAhAU/25mjvhKc6B8/s1600/CDE.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-aTEsShLjFw4/UVOR-ga19kI/AAAAAAAAhAU/25mjvhKc6B8/s1600/CDE.png\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negative ions create an\nalkaline environment. Cancer cells survive only in an acidic environment, which\nis an oxygen impoverished environment. When positive ions permeate into your\nskin, your sweat pores contract. &nbsp;Negative\nions cause the pores to expand and increase metabolism. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">85% negative ions are\nabsorbed by the skin and the balance via the lungs. &nbsp;Negative ions in the blood stream activates\ndelivery of oxygen to cells and tissues. Negative charged environment\nstimulates the body\u2019s self healing mechanism.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6N-Y1_ZbsKA/UVORcz86dqI/AAAAAAAAg_4/r91hySnxbEY/s1600/imagesDGHJK.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"282\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6N-Y1_ZbsKA/UVORcz86dqI/AAAAAAAAg_4/r91hySnxbEY/s320/imagesDGHJK.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ionizing a room drives\naway the dust , viruses and bacteria, as bacteria thrives on dust. This is the\nreason why the best hospitals of this planet have negative ion generators in\nthe post operation rooms . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can buy this in the\nmarket too for your home. Negative ions do NOT have any adverse side effects.\nEven modern poultry farms have negative ion generators.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Almost all major soccer\nclubs like Manchester United have negative ionizers in their dressing and\nchange rooms. Basically these machines use high voltage to ionize or\nelectrically charge air molecules\u2014they have an extra electron, to donate to\nelectron wrenching free radicals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8edVfDETlOM/UVPbDbVjfQI/AAAAAAAAhDE/FeextD4WVOI/s1600/P.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8edVfDETlOM/UVPbDbVjfQI/AAAAAAAAhDE/FeextD4WVOI/s400/P.png\" width=\"361\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nNow let me talk about the <span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Ashwamedha Yagna </b></span>.<br />\n<br />\nThis is what Wikipedia has to say -- ( you can check it yourself by Googling ASHVAMEDHA YAGNA WIKIPEDIA ).<br />\n<br />\nThey have even given a picture of the Queen lying down with the dead horse ( to be used as dildo for sexual gratification ) -- this picture was painted by a Muslim painter Sahibdin. <br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7kbHL-Z2x-s/UVOe3kKxzRI/AAAAAAAAhA8/gckaUqpYl_Q/s1600/300px-Asvamedha_ramayana.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"221\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7kbHL-Z2x-s/UVOe3kKxzRI/AAAAAAAAhA8/gckaUqpYl_Q/s400/300px-Asvamedha_ramayana.JPG\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nThey say he painted it in 1652 AD , which is a lie.&nbsp;</div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">QUOTE:--</b><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anyone who should stop\nthe horse is ritually cursed, and a <span style=\"color: red;\">dog is killed</span> ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The queens walk around\nthe dead horse reciting mantras. The chief <span style=\"color: red;\">queen then has to mimic copulation\nwith the dead horse</span>, while the <span style=\"color: red;\">other queens ritually utter obscenities </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">( probably they were singing &nbsp;ribald songs like DARA SINGH KA &nbsp;LUND-- &nbsp;TEE HEEEE ! ).</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the next morning,\nthe <span style=\"color: red;\">priests raise the queen from the place where she has spent the night with\nthe horse</span>.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The three queens with a hundred golden, silver and copper needles\nindicate the lines on the horse's body along which it will be dissected. The\nhorse is dissected, and its <span style=\"color: red;\">flesh roasted</span>. Various <span style=\"color: red;\">parts are offered to a host\nof deities</span> and personified concepts with <span style=\"color: red;\">utterances of svaha\n\"all-hail\".</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The human sacrifice,\nthe Purushamedha, followed a similar format,&nbsp;\nbut included a <span style=\"color: red;\">man</span> with the animals <span style=\"color: red;\">to be sacrificed.</span> The price of the\nman was set at one thousand cows and a hundred horses. Like the horse, the man\nchosen for sacrifice was allowed to wander for a year. <span style=\"color: red;\">Once he had been killed,\nthe queen lay with his corpse.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Laws of Manu refer\nto the Ashvamedha (V.53): 'The man who offers a horse-sacrifice every day for a\nhundred years, and the man who does not eat meat, the two of them reap the same\nfruit of good deeds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Mahabharata, the\nsacrifice is performed by Yudhishtira (. <span style=\"color: red;\">After the horse was cut into parts,\nDraupadi had to sit beside the parts of the horse</span>.)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ritual was\nperformed <span style=\"color: red;\">in strict compliance with Vedic prescriptions</span> (1.14.10). Dasaratha's\nchief wife Kausalya circumambulates the horse and ritually pierces its flesh\n(1.14.33).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then \"<span style=\"color: red;\">Queen Kausalya</span> desiring the results of ritual\ndisconcertedly <span style=\"color: red;\">resided one night with that horse</span> that flew away like a bird.\" .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the conclusion of the ritual <span style=\"color: red;\">Dasharatha symbolically offers his other wives\nto the presiding priests</span>, who return them in exchange for expensive gifts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\"An empire is like a horse and the\nsubjects like other inferior animals\" (p. 448). Thus, VSM 23.22, literally\n\"<span style=\"color: red;\">he beats on the vulva </span>(gabha), <span style=\"color: red;\">the penis </span>(pasas) <span style=\"color: red;\">oozes repeatedly</span>\n(ni-galgaliti)<span style=\"color: red;\"> in the receptacle</span>\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red;\">The three authors of the Vedas were\nbuffoons, knaves, and demons</span>. All the well-known formulae of the pandits,\njarphari, turphari, etc. and all the <span style=\"color: red;\">obscene rites for the queen commanded in\nAswamedha</span>, these were invented by buffoons, and so all the various kinds of\npresents to the priests, while <span style=\"color: red;\">the eating of flesh was similarly commanded by\nnight-prowling demons</span>.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mock <span style=\"color: red;\">bestiality ( sexual intercourse with animals ) and\nnecrophilia ( sexual attraction to dead animals ) involved in the ritual</span> <span style=\"color: red;\">caused considerable consternation among the\nscholars</span> first editing the Yajurveda. Griffith (1899) omits verses VSM 23.20\u201331\n(the ritual obscenities), protesting that they are \"<span style=\"color: red;\">not reproducible even\nin the semi-obscurity of a learned European language</span>\" (<span style=\"color: red;\">alluding to other\ninstances where he renders explicit scenes in Latin rather than English</span>). A. B.\nKeith's 1914 translation also omits verses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\">This part of the ritual\noffended the Dalit reformer and framer of the Indian constitution </span><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">B. R.\nAmbedkar </span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\">and is frequently mentioned in his writings as an example of the\nperceived degradation of Brahmanical culture.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>UNQUOTE:&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">So all Indian Hindus are fools and perverts except our dalit &nbsp;BR Ambedkar!</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Recently CNN IBN , the foreign funded TV station held a sham poll, to find out the greatest Indian after Gandhi. &nbsp;We MUST believe that Gandhi is the greatest-- this is compulsory!</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now who is BR Ambedkar? &nbsp;He was taken to Columbia Univesity to inject poison into the Vedas. Being a dalit there is no way, he could have laid his hand of the Vedas. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Out there in USA he wrote a book mocking Hinduism by the name of &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><b>RIDDLES IN HINDUISM, </b>in league with the white Christian missionaries.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Goole search <b><span style=\"color: red;\">CNN IBN POLL, GREATEST INDIAN SINCE GANDHI VADAKAYIL&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>Below: &nbsp;Watch the video of BR Ambedkar ( acted by Malayalam Megastar Mammooty ). Mammooty is NOT anti-Hindu, he just acted out a scripted role.</b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/Zt0KZT2qyqo/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/Zt0KZT2qyqo&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/Zt0KZT2qyqo&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So what is the truth\nabout </span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">ASHWAMEDHA YAGNA</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The truth is the horse\nis NOT killed at all-- leave alone the queen having sexual intercourse with a dead horse's you know what..&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A spirited horse is\nchosen , with white fur and no blemishes. A yagna ( Agnihotra homam ) is held\nBEFORE the horse sets out on a guided tour.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ashwamedha yagna cannot\nbe held by a mortal. &nbsp;It is held by the\nking of Gods Indra. &nbsp;It can only be done\nby a mortal king if he is commanded to do it by an avatar of Vishnu.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This tradition was\nbroken by King Mahabali of Kerala. He was an asura ( demon ) king. The people\nof Kerala were very happy with this king as he was a wise and just ruler, and\nthere was prosperity all over.&nbsp; King\nMahabali did the Ashwameda yagna. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This made Indra very\njealous, as this was his prerogative, and nobody had the guts to kill the white\nAshwamedha horse &nbsp;of King Mahabali. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He prevailed on Aditi,\nhis mother to convince Vishnu to correct this imbalance, where an Asura King\ncould cock a snook at the King of Gods . Vishnu decided to intervene and took\nthe 5<sup>th</sup>&nbsp; avatar of Vamana --a\nblue faced Brahmin midget ( dwarf ) .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wJE-Lz9Q6WY/UVOq04kLPtI/AAAAAAAAhBY/xnBusShGETA/s1600/imagesCAYPUCFU.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wJE-Lz9Q6WY/UVOq04kLPtI/AAAAAAAAhBY/xnBusShGETA/s400/imagesCAYPUCFU.jpg\" width=\"298\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Brahmin dwarf asked\nKing Mahabali for alms-- a small grant of land.&nbsp;\nThe King told him that he can take as much land area as he wished,\nwithin his kingdom . But the midget wanted only three strides ( paces )&nbsp; of land. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Immediately the kings\nadvisor Sage Shukracharya who was a seer, advised his king NOT to agree to this\nrequest, as he suspected something amiss and was sure of foul play. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mahabali being a very\ngenerous king, could NOT imagine going back on his word, during a divine\nsacrifice. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So he agreed to grant\nthe boon of three paces of land. Vamana immediately assumed the gigantic form\nof Vishnu ( the Preserver lord ) and in the first two steps covered the whole\nof earth and cosmos. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-621yBNSOFiE/UVOqvujDEfI/AAAAAAAAhBQ/4UzETpRnlAg/s1600/bdw.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-621yBNSOFiE/UVOqvujDEfI/AAAAAAAAhBQ/4UzETpRnlAg/s200/bdw.png\" width=\"163\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then he asked the king\nwhere he should keep his third step. The king bowed down on his knees and told\nhim to place the third step on his head. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before that he asked\nthat he should be able to visit and bless his subjects once every year . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vishnu granted this\nboon and placed his foot on Mahabali's head and instead of driving him\nunderground to the netherworld , he sent him to heaven -- pleased with his\nrighteousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS THE REASON WHY\nALL MALAYALIS CELEBRATE ONAM -- THE DAY THE KING WILL COME EVERY YEAR.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A CARPET OF FRESH FLOWERS IS LAID AT THE\nENTRANCE OF EVERY HOUSE.&nbsp; DIWALI OR\nDEEPAWALI MARKS THE VICTORY OF GODS , OR DEFEAT OF KING MAHABALI .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\"><b>DIWALI IS CELEBRATED BY THE WHOLE OF INDIA --\nEXCEPT KERALA.</b></span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-epa9-B18a_w/UVOqoAkBmKI/AAAAAAAAhBI/9shfGPAIjBc/s1600/downloadHKJJUTC.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"281\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-epa9-B18a_w/UVOqoAkBmKI/AAAAAAAAhBI/9shfGPAIjBc/s400/downloadHKJJUTC.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So why is the white\nhorse on a guided tour? &nbsp;This is the essence of Ashwameda.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The emperor seeks to check\nout if any of his vassal kings want to challenge his supreme authority\u2014 in\npublic. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The horse is guided by\nthe Emperor\u2019s generals and chosen ministers . They generals follow the white\nhorse on their own horses.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The horse with clanging bells is made to travel\nthrough the vassal kingdoms. &nbsp;Any vassal king can kill the horse and thus\ndeclare war on the Emperor,&nbsp; which will\nhappen pretty soon. &nbsp;If he just captures the horse, there may be room for negotiation.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The horse is even taken to enemy kingdoms, and there is\n\u201cdiplomatic immunity\u201d for the Emperor\u2019s men not the white horse. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any tough\nacting intentions are gauged out.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the horse returns safe and sound, it means\nall is well-- and the emperor's supreme authority is unchallenged. &nbsp;And all know it too.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the POST Ashwamedha yagna all vassal kings are invited, and there are celebrations all around , &nbsp;for peace and prosperity &nbsp;in future. &nbsp;Soldiers go home to their families.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">IN MODERN TERMS THIS IS LIKE A OPEN \"CONFIDENCE \" MOTION IN THE PARLIAMENT.</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now consider this --</span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">55 million devotees go\non pilgrimage to Sabarimala ever year.&nbsp;\nIf you average this out Sabarimala beats Kumbh Mela as the most popular\npilgrimage spot. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ever since Sabarimala\nhas become the world\u2019s No 1 pilgrimage centre there is a concerted attempt by\nthe Christian missionaries and historians to discredit the diety Lord Ayyappa. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To make Ayyappa a\nrecent phenomenon, initially they made Ayyappa have imaginary conversations\nwith a Vavar a Muslim friend ( sic!). &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When\nthat did NOT work, they transported him back by several thousand years and made\nhim the son of Mohini , after Samudra manthan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Ayyappa is the 9th\navatar of Vishnu, not Buddha as injected by the white Christian invader.&nbsp; Buddha was a mortal NOT a god, who was the\nfirst to mirror Hinduism. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later many\nmortals became gods, including a Yank by the name of Joseph Smith 190 years ago.\n&nbsp;He used converted the right handed\nSwastika of Hinduism and made it Left handed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-o-K018Cxu7s/UVPNLA4b0EI/AAAAAAAAhB4/woiDInPauEg/s1600/downloadjkytdcd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-o-K018Cxu7s/UVPNLA4b0EI/AAAAAAAAhB4/woiDInPauEg/s320/downloadjkytdcd.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>QUOTE :--</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Transgender Hijras\nconsider Krishna-Mohini as a transsexual</span>, rather than a true female.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shiva wishes to see the bewildering Mohini\nagain. When Vishnu agrees and reveals his Mohini form, <span style=\"color: red;\">Shiva runs crazily\nbehind Mohini, \"bereft of shame and robbed by her of good sense,\"\nwhile the abandoned wife Parvati (Uma) looks on.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Shiva is overcome by K\u0101ma\n</span>(love and desire or Kamadeva, the god of love and desire). &nbsp;<span style=\"color: red;\">His\n\"unfailing\" seed ( semen ) escapes like that of \"a love-maddened elephant\nchasing a desiring female\" and falls on ground </span>creating ores of silver and\ngold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Overcome by lust, Shiva\nchases Mohini as Parvati hangs her head in shame and envy. <span style=\"color: red;\">Shiva grabs Mohini's\nhand and embraces her, but Mohini frees herself and runs </span>further.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Finally,\n<span style=\"color: red;\">Shiva grabs her and their \"violent coupling\" leads to discharge of\nShiva's seed which falls \"short of its goal,\"</span> suggesting the act was\nnot consummated. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the later story of\nthe origin of Ayyappa, <span style=\"color: red;\">Shiva impregnates Mohini, who gives birth to Ayyappa.\nThey abandon Ayyappa in shame</span>.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The legend highlights Vishnu's protests to be\nMohini again and also notes that Ayyappa is born of Vishnu's thigh as<span style=\"color: red;\"> Mohini\ndoes not have a real womb</span>.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another variant says that instead of a biological\norigin, <span style=\"color: red;\">Ayyappa sprang from Shiva's semen, which he ejaculated upon embracing\nMohini.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mohini seduces the\nsages. Mohini is depicted nude, adorned with garlands and ornaments, holding a\nlotus and a parrot, leaning on a stick. <span style=\"color: red;\">The sages pray to her, as their\nphalluses point to her.</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">( HEY, WHO FITTED THE HOMING DEVICE ON THEM PRICKS? &nbsp;TEE HEEEEE !! )</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An <span style=\"color: red;\">\"explicit, male\nhomosexual act</span>\" is suggested is in a Telugu text where when <span style=\"color: red;\">Shiva is busy\nlovemaking with Mohini-Vishnu, the latter returns to his original form ( male ) and\nstill the lovemaking continues.</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">( REALLY I SAW TWO MEN SCREWING WITH MY BEADY EYE ! -- PROMISE ! - TEE HEEE !! )&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">UNQUOTE:-</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">ALL &nbsp;ABOVE UNACCEPTABLE AND VULGAR SLANDER HAS BEEN DELETED, &nbsp;AND THE WIKIPEDIA POST ON MOHINI RE-EDITED BY ONE ON MY READERS.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
