text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">QUOTE&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For the sake of the\nprosperity of the worlds (the divine one) caused the Brahmana, the Kshatriya,\nthe Vaisya, and the Sudra to proceed from his mouth, his arm, his thighs and\nhis feet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One occupation only the\nlord prescribed to the Sudras,<span style=\"color: red;\"> to serve meekly even these (other) three castes</span>.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once-born man (a\nSudra), who insults a twice-born man with gross invective, <span style=\"color: red;\">shall have his\ntongue cut out;</span> for he is of low origin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If he mentions the\nnames and castes (gati) of the (twice-born) with contumely,<span style=\"color: red;\"> an iron nail, ten\nfingers long, shall be thrust red-hot into his mouth.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If he arrogantly teaches\nBrahmanas their duty, the king shall cause<span style=\"color: red;\"> hot oil to be poured into his mouth\nand into his ears.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With whatever limb a\nman of a low caste does hurt to (a man of the three) highest (castes), even\nthat<span style=\"color: red;\"> limb shall be cut off; that is the teaching of Manu</span>.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He who raises his hand\nor a stick, shall have his<span style=\"color: red;\"> hand cut off</span>; he who in anger kicks with his foot,\n<span style=\"color: red;\">shall have his foot cut off.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A low-caste man who\ntries to place himself on the same seat with a man of a high caste, <span style=\"color: red;\">shall be\nbranded on his hip </span>and be banished, or (the king) shall <span style=\"color: red;\">cause his buttock to be\ngashed</span>.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let him never slay a\nBrahmana, though he have committed all (possible) crimes; let him banish such\nan (offender), <span style=\"color: red;\">leaving all his property (to him) </span>and (his body) unhurt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the shudra\nintentionally listens for committing to memory the veda, then his <span style=\"color: red;\">ears should\nbe filled with (molten) lead and lac</span>; if he utters the veda, then <span style=\"color: red;\">his tongue\nshould be cut off;</span> if he has mastered the veda<span style=\"color: red;\"> his body should be cut to\npieces.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Women </span>do not care for\nbeauty, nor is their attention fixed on age; (thinking), \u2018(It is enough that)\nhe is a man,\u2019 t<span style=\"color: red;\">hey give themselves to the handsome and to the ugly.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">(ALL THEY WANT IS THAT THING BETWEEN THE MAN'S LEGS--TEE HEEEE!)&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AG5EKETHL4Y/UVPZsZPqyUI/AAAAAAAAhCw/rJgubi7Eh94/s1600/images%5B9U%5D.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Through their passion\nfor men,</span> through their mutable temper, through their <span style=\"color: red;\">natural heartlessness</span>,\nthey become <span style=\"color: red;\">disloyal towards their husbands, however carefully they may be\nguarded in this (world).</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: red;\">IF INDIA BECOMES A SLAVE NATION EVER AGAIN\n,&nbsp; IT WILL BE SOLELY THE HANDIWORK OF\nFOREIGN FUNDED NGOs AND MULTINATIONALS WHO WERE INVITED ( BY FDI IN RETIAL ) , WHO LOVE TO BRIBE OUR MINISTERS AND MEDIA.</span>.&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There\nare thousands of foreign funded NGOs in India, who cannot come under the income\ntax radar scanner. &nbsp;Why is there no\neffort to check that all NGO funds come in by legal route? &nbsp;Why is the UPA government not keeping a tab on\nNGOs and not forcing them to submit their account books? &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Does democracy in India have any meaning\nwhen foreign forces decide who stands as a candidate?&nbsp; This is done even at lowest Panchayat\nlevels-- as the Koodankulam Panchayat president is installed by a Christian\nmissionary NGO.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kiran Bedi , desptite an order from Supreme court gave special\ntreatment to a foreign prisoner, and a grateful Zionist lobby gave her the\nMagsaysay award. &nbsp;Why are Indian NGOs so fond of saving foreign criminals?&nbsp; Why are foreign forces so particular in\nsaving certain Indian criminals, in the name of human rights?.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; She looks damn healthy on TV, if she is indeed\nforce fed&nbsp; only by intravenous needle .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do\nyou know why so many \"human rights awards\" and \"defenders of\ndemocracy awards \"&nbsp; are going to\nanti-national Indians nowadays? Any Indian activist , getting a foreign award today, must be viewed with suspicion.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the &nbsp;kidney transplants, &nbsp;liver transplants and &nbsp;heart transplants performed in the West today,\n&nbsp;have these parts sourced from India, &nbsp;arranged secretly by foreign funded Christian NGOs\n.. Why is the UPA government allowing this?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">If you say a word\nagainst a Jew in USA , you will be branded anti-semitic and you will be sued by\nZionist organizations funded by powerful forces.&nbsp; But if&nbsp;\nyou say Hindu Goddess Sita had sex with Ravana, well you will be invited\nto the White house and Queen's box at Wimbledon, for exercising your freedom of\nexpression-- and you will be in line for the next Rockfeller award.&nbsp; What bullshit is this?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me remind all Indians\n, when the whole of the west has just come out from under the quarternary ice\nage, and were eating raw meat , staying in caves, doing grunt grunt for language\nand wearing animal skins , India was a huge civilization with advanced\nmathematics and science , with more than 2000 languages.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Wiki leaks\nCongress party's general secretary Rahul Gandhi remarked to US Ambassador\nTimothy Roemer, at a luncheon hosted by Prime Minister of India at his\nresidence in July 2009, that 'Hindu radicalized groups ( read as RSS ) posed a\nbigger threat' to India than the Laskar E Toiba. &nbsp;Never mind RSS fought for India's freedom and Nehru made RSS march in the Republic day parade .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Try putting a comment with J<span style=\"color: red;\">O</span>SHUA PR<span style=\"color: red;\">O</span>JECT words in the comments column of India's major newspaper The Hindu, and a message will come \" <i>The article you look for is not availabl</i>e\" . &nbsp;But if you put ZERO instead of O, &nbsp;the comment is taken in, to be moderated and rejected..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Now let me talk about <span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>RADHA!</b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>The FAKE Garga Samhita\ndescribes the wedding of Radha and Krishna. </b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Radha\u2019s name is worshipped in Vraja Bhumi but\nnot found in any puranas- and this includes the original Brahma Varta Purana ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I had a Chief Officer\non one of my ships\u2014 he starts everything with JAI RADHEY!&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was almost used like\nOM ! or PRANAM! &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When he spoke &nbsp;to his mother or brothers , the conversation\nstarted with JAI RADHEY .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>Radha, daughter of\nVrishabhanu, was the mistress of Krishna during that period of his life when he\nlived among the cowherds of Vrindavan. &nbsp;Since\nchildhood they were close to each other - they played, they danced, they\nfought, they grew up together and wanted to be together forever, but the world\npulled them apart. &nbsp;He departed to\nsafeguard the virtues of truth, and she waited for him. &nbsp;He vanquished his enemies, became the king,\nand came to be worshipped as a lord of the universe. &nbsp;She waited for him. &nbsp;He married Rukmini and Satyabhama, raised a\nfamily, fought the great war of Ayodhya, and she still waited. &nbsp;So great was Radha's love for Krishna that\neven today her name is uttered whenever Krishna is refered to, and Krishna\nworship is though to be incomplete without the deification of Radha. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sage Vyasa refers\nto this as the 'Rasa'. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">MANY INDIAN ARTISTS AND\nPOETS WERE LITERALLY ARM TWISTED BY THE WHITE CHRISTIAN INVADER TO POPULARISE A\nFAKE PHYSICAL LOVE STORY</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-s6zebBLAyEQ/UVUlrYTHWpI/AAAAAAAAhEc/24twP74-s5Y/s1600/raja_ravivarma_painting_radha_madhava.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-s6zebBLAyEQ/UVUlrYTHWpI/AAAAAAAAhEc/24twP74-s5Y/s640/raja_ravivarma_painting_radha_madhava.jpg\" width=\"440\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b>Above: Raja Ravi Varma painting ( 1890 AD ) --where Lord Krishna is engaged is sexual fore-play with Radha.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Radha is not just one attractive\ncowherd maiden, but is the origin of all divine personalities that participate\nin the rasa dance. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Krishna's youthful\ndalliances with the 'gopis' just symbolic of the ALLEGORICAL loving interplay\nbetween God and the human soul. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Radha's utterly\nrapturous love for Krishna and their relationship is allegorical of the quest\nfor union with the divine. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This kind of love is of\nthe highest form of devotion in Vaishnavism, and is symbolically represented as\nthe bond between the wife and husband or beloved and lover.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Radha is not mentioned\nby name in Srimad Bhagavatam but is alluded to within the tenth chapter of the\ntext as one of the gopis who Krishna plays with during his upbringing as a\nyoung boy.&nbsp; It is in later texts such as\nthe Gita Govinda , injected with poison by the White Christian invader , where\nwe find such LOVE stories.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Srila Prabhupada of\nISKON tried to do some damage control\u2014</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>to rampant Western insinuations of Lord Krishna\nhaving a mistress with whom he had sexual intercourse behind his wife.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;<span style=\"color: magenta;\"><b>( Srila Prabhupada on Radhastami, Srimati\nRadharani's Appearance Day. Montreal, August 30, 1968)<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\"><b>\"........this\nRadharani's name is not in the Srimad-Bhagavatam.&nbsp; How this name came, Radharani?....... There\nis anayaradhyate.&nbsp; There are many gopis,\nbut it is mentioned that by this particular gopi He [Krishna] is served more\npleasingly. Krishna accepts this gopi's service more gladly Anayaradhyate.\nAradhyate. This aradhate, this word, aradhyate means worshiping.&nbsp; From this word aradhyate, Radha has\ncome.&nbsp; But Radha's name are there in\nother Puranas. So this is the origin.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\"><b>.....Radha-Krishna\nphilosophy has to be understood by the liberated person, not by the conditioned\nsoul. So we shall await for the fortunate moment when we are liberated, then we\nshall understand radha - krishna - pranaya - vikrtir.&nbsp; Because Krishna and Radha, They are not on\nthe material field.&nbsp; Try to\nunderstand.&nbsp; This is Jiva Gosvami's\nanalysis, that Krishna is the Supreme Brahman. The Supreme Brahman cannot\naccept anything material.&nbsp; So Radha is\nnot in the material field.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\"><b>....we should not treat\nRadharani as ordinary girl, or Krishna as ordinary man. They are the Supreme\nAbsolute Truth.&nbsp; But in the Absolute\nTruth, there is the pleasure potency, and that is exhibited in the dealings of\nRadha and Krishna. And Radha's expansion all the gopis, and Krishna is the\nSupreme Lord.\"</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of Radharani's names,\nHARA (mentioned in Narada-pancaratra 5.5.59), in vocative Hare, forms a part of\nthe Hare Krishna 'Maha-Mantra', one of the most popular Vedic mantras,\nespecially amongst Gaudiya Vaishnavas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Brihad-Gautamiya\nTantra, Radharani is described as follows: \"The transcendental goddess\nSrimati Radharani is the direct counterpart of Lord Sri Krishna. She is the\ncentral figure for all the goddesses of fortune. She possesses all the\nattractiveness to attract the all-attractive Personality of Godhead. She is the\nprimeval internal potency of the Lord.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All the ancient books\nthat refer to Sri Krishna, the name of Sri Radha occurs only in two:- the\nINJECTED Brahmavaivarta Purana&nbsp; and in\nthe <b><span style=\"color: red;\">INJECTED works of poet Jaidev</span></b>\u2014 for whom the&nbsp;\nBengalis and Oriyas fight over.. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Kaun Banega\nCrorepati (KBC III) &nbsp;the Bongs tried to establish\nthat Jayadeva is a court poet of king Lakshmanasena of Bengal. This triggered\nan immediate volley of protests by from the Oriyas. &nbsp;In Ashtapadi No.21 Radha, the Jeevatma, merges\nwith Krishna, who is The Paramatma. &nbsp;Jayadeva's\nashtapadis that are sung in dance performances of Odissi, the classical dance\nof Orissa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The INJECTED Padma\nPurana describes 18,000 cowherd-girls (gopis) among whom it says 108 are the\nmost important. Among those 108, eight are considered more important still, and\namong the eight, two have a special position - Chandravali and Radharani. Of\nthe two, Radha is considered the foremost. Others are: Lalita, Vishakha, Padma,\nBhadra, Saibya and Syama.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to the\nMahabharat and the Puranas, &nbsp;Draupadi was\nregarded as the most beautiful and virtuous of all women at the time. &nbsp;(She would never use the phallus of a dead\nhorse as a dildo, in Yuddhishtra Ashwamedha Yagna ). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is said that if\nthere was any one woman just as beautiful and virtuous as she was, it was Krishna\u2019s\nwife Rukmini.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>Indians were introduced\nto Radha for the first time in Brahmavaivarta Purana, which according to the\nEnglishman Wilson, is the latest of all the Puranas. &nbsp;It was he who declared that the original\nBrahmavaivarta Purana is now lost forever ( actually hidden in the British\nmuseum in London ).<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is commonly\nunderstood that Krishna is an Avatara of Vishnu. But in the Brahmavaivarta\nPurana that is available to us, it is the other way round! Here, Krishna is the\ncreator of Vishnu and all other gods and living creatures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">in this <b><span style=\"color: red;\">POISON INJECTED\nnew Brahmavaivarta Purana</span></b>, there is another important character called Viraja\nwho is a rival of Radha for Sri Krishna\u2019s love. In this version,<span style=\"color: red;\"> Krishna goes\nto Viraja\u2019s house which makes Radha angry and jealous.</span> She follows him in her\nchariot and comes to Viraja\u2019s house, too. Viraja\u2019s watchman, Sridama, however\ndoes not allow her to enter. Inside, though, Viraja gets so scared of Radha\nthat she melts and becomes a river.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Krishna promptly\nrevives her and gives her back her original form. <span style=\"color: red;\">Their intense lovemaking, by\nand by, results in the birth of seven sons, whom their mother\u2019s curse turns\ninto seven seas</span>. <span style=\"color: red;\">The mother curses them because they disturb her in her\nlovemaking </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">( THE BED MUST HAVE BEEN CREAKING BADLY --<b>TEE HEEE !!</b> )</span><span style=\"color: red;\"> .</span>&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Radha, on hearing of this romance admonishes Krishna and punishes\nhim with a curse that would force him to be born on earth.&nbsp; At this, Sridama, the watchman who is a\ndevotee of Sri Krishna, rebukes Radha which infuriates her.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Radha curses him\ntoo to be born as an Asura. Sridama takes his revenge by cursing Radha to be\nborn as a human female who would acquire infamy for her loose character. Later,\nboth Sridama and Radha pray to Krishna to save them from each other\u2019s curses.\nKrishna blesses Sridama with the boon that he would be the king of Asuras. And\nhe consoles Radha by promising that when she goes to earth, he himself would\nfollow her.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">WHAT THE HELL IS ALL\nTHIS?&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ARE WE HINDUS IDIOTS , LIKE WHAT JUSTICE KATJU SAYS?</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>WIKIPEDIA , I KNOW YOU WILL READ THIS. font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">SARASWATI WIFE OF BRAHMA IS THE MOTHER LIGHT ENERGY FROM QUASARS ( FASTER THAN LIGHT IN SPEED )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html\" style=\"background-color: lime; color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html</a><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">KALI THE WIFE OF SHIVA IS DARK ENERGY OF THE COSMOS --SHE REPRESENTS THE BLACK HOLE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In Dvaita Hinduism opposite poles Tamas and Rajas are conscious of each other. Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites Tamas. Sattva preserves and mediates .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos is change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is vibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic spiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">One cannot exist without the other and they are dependant . No phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They consume each other yet support each other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">If the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the mediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. This is why Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER god. And only Vishnu can have mortal avatars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">As for the opposing forces TAMAS/ RAJAS ( Brahma/ Shiva ) it really does NOT matter as who is who, like in AC electricity-where you can plug into the socket both ways.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">These two opposing forces are natural and transform each other , in perfect harmony. Harmony can never be stagnant . Lessening of Tamas always results in increase of Rajas and vice versa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Balance can never be permanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously devour each other \u2013 and life flows on. This universe cannot exist without vibrations between two poles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE THIRD TEMPLATE IS SAMKHYA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">This is about the male and female joint TEAM effort. This is NOT a dance of opposites. In Hinduism we call the MALE- purusha and FEMALE- prakriti.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as being created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are permanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti (Prakriti ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Each of the trinity gods are powerless without their consorts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Purusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the same body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a mindboggling, intelligent concept.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Both Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the changeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active aspect of the same Consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Through uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his spirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS here- not street side sex as figured out by small minds)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">When the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Purusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle. Pragati symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The relationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and energy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Prakriti cannot be perceived, not because of its non-existence, but because of its subtlety. It is perceived in its effects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and Shakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well as in its dynamic one. Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also the agent of all change<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Shakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Modern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy are interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Samkhya as you can see was a masterpiece of modeling the ways of the inner universe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini rise is the liberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; MY GOAN PURSER WHOSE BROTHER WAS A PRIEST IN VATICAN, HE WAS WITH ME.. WE HAD FREE FOOD AND LODGING -- NICE SPACIOUS CLEAN..<br /><br />THE WORD SPREAD AND SOME EXCITED MALAYALI NUNS CAME RUNNING TO SEE ME.. ALL PRETTY.. I WAS SURPRISED AS KERALA NUNS ARE ALL FUCKIN' BALLS TO LOOK AT.<br /><br />ONE NUN TOLD ME ABOUT THE RAMPANT SEXUAL ABUSE.. SHE WAS BEING ABUSED BY BOTH PRIESTS AND NUNS..<br /><br />IT WAS ALMOST AS IF SHE WAS A SEX SLAVE AND EXPECTED ME TO DO SOMETHING..<br /><br />I HAVE DONE MY PART IN THE PRE-INTERNET DAYS USING WHITE CLERGY IN BRITAIN.. SO I DONT HAVE A GUILTY CONSCIENCE ABOUT THIS.. MY DECISION TO START BLOGGING TO EXHUME BURIED TRUTHS HAS A ROOT IN THIS UNFORTUNATE NUN..<br /><br />SHE TOLD ME THAT BISHOPS ARE CHOSEN BY POPE IN KERALA TO SNUFF OUT ANY WHISTLE BLOWERS BY CASH/ LAND OR FEAR .. IT WAS A WATER TIGHT SYSTEM..<br /><br />The Vatican instructed Catholic bishops around the world to cover up cases of sexual abuse or risk being thrown out of the Church.<br /><br />It focuses on sexual abuse initiated as part of the confessional relationship between a priest and a member of his congregation. But the instructions also cover what it calls the 'worst crime', described as an obscene act perpetrated by a cleric with 'youths of either sex<br /><br />The 69-page Latin document bearing the seal of Pope John XXIII was sent to every bishop in the world. The instructions outline a policy of 'strictest' secrecy in dealing with allegations of sexual abuse and threatens those who speak out with excommunication.<br /><br />They also call for the victim to take an oath of secrecy at the time of making a complaint to Church officials. It states that the instructions are to 'be diligently stored in the secret archives of the Curia [Vatican] as strictly confidential. Nor is it to be published nor added to with any commentaries.'<br /><br />I DONT NEED TO PROVE ANYTHING --BUT MY PHOTO INSIDE THE COLOSSEUM ( WEARING WRANGLER JACKET , LEVI JEANS AND YASHICA CAMERA ) WAS TAKEN THE SAME DAY..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/the-huge-statue-of-colossus-of-rome-at.html</span><br /><br />IN THE POST BELOW, YOU CAN SEE MY PHOTO ON THE STEPS OF ST PETERs CATHEDRAL VATICAN ON THE SAME DAY. THE TALL MAN WITH ME IS SECOND ENGINEER, A HINDU MALAYALI FROM CALICUT.<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/the-rotating-statue-on-nemi-ship-on.html</span><br /><br />The pope has set guidelines for removing bishops who have been \u201cnegligent\u201d in addressing cases of abuse. This is all charade..<br /><br />There has been a long history of protecting highly placed Catholic leaders from charges of sexual abuse.<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_30BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5270560851422573945\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_7.html?showComment=1533686521119#c5270560851422573945\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 8, 2018 at 5:32 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_28MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br /><br />When reports surfaced in 1995 that Austrian Cardinal Hans Hermann Groer had molested monks and schoolboys, the sexual abuse was dismissed by Bishop Kurt Krenn as \u201cboyish pranks.\u201d It was proved that parents of child victims were paid \u201chush money\u201d to buy their silence. The allegations of sexual abuse against Cardinal Groer proved to be true.<br /><br />LISTEN , ABOVE IS JUST ONE OF THE THOUSANDS OF CASES..<br /><br />In another case from the late 1940s, Marcial Maciel, the Mexican founder of a religious order, The Legionaries of Christ, was a sexual abuser multiple times over. When allegations against Maciel were initially raised, John Paul II ignored them.<br /><br />Joseph Ratzinger, John Paul II\u2019s confident and later successor, remarked: \u201cOne can\u2019t put on trial such a close friend of the pope.\u201d<br /><br />Maciel avoided prosecution until his death in 2008.<br /><br />The hierarchical structure of the church made it difficult to bring high-ranking figures to justice.<br /><br />Superiors are given nearly absolute obedience, which makes the threshold for acting against them high. By the same token, superiors can often protect offending priests.<br /><br />It is a terrible sin for a bishop to commit or cover up a terrible crime such as rape or sexual abuse. You see, the Catholic Church is a divine institution necessary for salvation, then there are those who will protect its reputation at all costs.<br /><br />ASRAMA BAPU HAS BEEN FRAMED TO PROVE THAT SUCH THINGS HAPPEN IN HINDUISM TOO. ALMOST ALL HIS ROOTLESS VULNERABLE FOLLOWERS ARE NOW CHRISTIAN CONVERTS..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/03/holi-celebrations-immoral-attack-on.html</span><br /><br />There is a tipping point, however. The key moment leading to the resignation of Cardinal Law was a letter, signed by 58 priests, asking him to resign.<br /><br />While the priest that Cardinal Law protected, John Geoghan, was convicted of his crimes \u2013 and later killed in prison \u2013 Bernard Law himself never faced a court of justice.<br /><br />In fact, he was effectively promoted to a venerable position as head of one of Catholicism\u2019s most famous churches, Santa Maria Maggiore in Rome.<br /><br />For victims of sexual abuse that occurred under his tenure, Cardinal Law only offered only a general apology and a vague reference to his own \u201cshortcomings.\u201d<br /><br />THE KERALA BISHOP MADE LOT OF HOOO HAAA ABOUT NCW WANTING TO STOP CONFESSIONS IN CHURCH..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.hindustantimes.com/india-news/kerala-nun-rape-audio-clip-of-priest-trying-to-bribe-nun-surfaces-case-registered/story-46dy2OsB6YSIYJoyuuur0L.html</span><br /><br />There is an international conspiracy by the Church to hush up sexual abuse issues. It is a devious attempt to conceal criminal conduct and is a blueprint for deception and concealment.<br /><br />Threatening excommunication to anybody who speaks out shows the lengths the most senior figures in the Vatican were prepared to go to prevent the information getting out to the public domain<br /><br />THREE BILLION USD PAY OUT IN THE POST BELOW IS GROSS UNDER ESTIMATION.. MORE THAN 5.7 BILLION USD OF MOTHER TERESAs MONEY WITH POPE WAS USED IN HUSH MONEY..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.huffingtonpost.in/entry/sex-abuse-catholic-church_n_5085414</span><br /><br />TIME TO EXHUME NAKED TRUTHS..<br /><br />PROTESTANTS DO NOT CONFESS IN CHURCH..<br /><br />PROTESTANTS DO NOT BELIEVE THAT GOD IS IGNORANT OF YOUR SINS.. AND HENCE REQUIRES A MIDDLEMAN BETWEEN THE DEVOTEE AND HIS GOD..<br /><br />PROTESTANT BELIEVE THAT ONLY GOD CAN FORGIVE--NOT A BROKER POPE OF PADRE..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/03/protestant-christianity-created-by-jews.html</span><br />THERE IS ABSOLUTELY NO REFERENCE IN THE BIBLE OLD OR NEW ABOUT CONFESSING TO A MIDDLEMAN PRIEST WITHIN THE CONFINED OF A CONFESSION BOX INSIDE THE CHURCH..<br /><br />BIBLE WANTS SINNERS TO CONFESS TO GOD DIRECT IN REPENTANCE..<br /><br />QUOTE: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness. 1 john 1.9\u2014UNQUOTE<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_28MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_28BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_28B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_29B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6260624235427538576\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_29M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. This was more of a political ploy..<br /><br />UTRIUSQUE SEXUS MEANS HERMAPHRODITE.. A PERSON WITH PENIS ( WITHOUT BALLS ) AND VAGINA ..<br /><br />THESE UNFORTUNATE PEOPLE WERE THEN BLACKMAILED FOR SEX BY CATHOLIC ELITES WHO ENGAGED IN SUCH DEVIANT PLEASURES ..<br /><br />CONFESSIONS WERE 100% SEXUAL IN NATURE AND WEALTHY GAY CLIENTSS USED TO WAIT OUTSIDE THE CHURCH..<br /><br />THE SEXUAL ORIENTATION OF THIS HERMAPHRODITE WAS WHAT WAS CONFESSED AS SOMETIME IT COULD SATISFY AN ANAL SEX HUMPING GAY-- OR EVEN A PERVERTED STRAIGHT AS IT HAD A VAGINA.. .<br /><br />LATER THIS CONFESSION WAS EXTENDED TO BOTH MALE AND FEMALE GENDERS.. , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">COCONUT OIL AS BRAIN FOOD&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red;\">, &nbsp;TERMINALIA ARJUNA BARK\nTHE AYURVEDA HEART TONIC</span> &nbsp;,&nbsp; <span style=\"color: blue;\">SHORT CHAIN FATTY ACIDS OF &nbsp;NON-HYDROGENATED &nbsp;COCONUT OILS</span> , &nbsp;<span style=\"color: magenta;\">FALSE PROPAGANDA BY FOREIGN GM SEED COOKING OIL MANUFACTURERS</span></b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> &nbsp;\u2013 CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-A4Sa2Mhsp8s/UU_-jMntGeI/AAAAAAAAg7Q/W412TMjr3EQ/s1600/images+(7)hhjkll.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"181\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-A4Sa2Mhsp8s/UU_-jMntGeI/AAAAAAAAg7Q/W412TMjr3EQ/s320/images+(7)hhjkll.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before India got\nindependence heart attack , kidney problems and Alzhiemers disease was unknown\nin Kerala. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today Kerala is the head\nquarters of these killer diseases, as we consume bad for health GM seed\nvegetable oils..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In olden days , people\nof Kerala used VIRGIN coconut oils for cooking. &nbsp;Almost all the houses, including my own , &nbsp;dried their own coconuts in the back yard and\ntook the copra to the nearby crusher mill to extract fresh oil. Those days\nready made powdered atta wheat was NOT available in the shops. &nbsp;So every nearby mill has a motorized crusher\nand grinder. &nbsp;Fresh coconut oil made food\nvery tasty and healthy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With Independence , we\nhad \u201clobbied up\u201d corrupt ministers who imported vegetable oils from abroad. &nbsp;They joined the false Western propaganda that\nCoconut oil is bad for the heart. &nbsp;Deliberately these foreign laboratories used\nHYDROGENATED coconut oils for their tests, to convince people with their lies. .\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Coconut oil is\nhydrogenated so that the freezing point is raised, and the oil does NOT freeze\non a cool day of less than 24 deg centigrade. &nbsp;In Kerala we all know that in the months of\nDec and Jan when morning temperatures fall less than 24 deg centigrade , we had\nto put a spoon into the coconut oil bottle , to scoop out the white solidified oil.\nIn winter we stored our oil in wide mouth bottles, exactly for this. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today\nif you suspect the virgin coconut oil you buy in the supermarket, &nbsp;just put the bottle horizontally in the\nfreezer to solidify it , and then place it a warm place vertically to melt the\noil with a thermometer inserted. &nbsp;It the\noil takes a high 38 deg centigrade of heat to UN freeze it means the oil is\nhydrogenated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the high heat of\nIndian cooking of &gt;250 deg Centigrade fancy oils like Canola,&nbsp; Olive , Corn, Safflower, Sunflower , Soya etc\n, gets unstable with free radicals abuzz from pulverised molecules and become\ncarcinogenic. In India we do NOT stir fry our foods at low heat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cVirgin\" coconut\noil is organic and unrefined with NIL additives . It is undeodorized,\nunhardened coconut oil, with high levels of natural anti-oxidants , NIL trans\nfats . Coconut oil can be used to deep fry because it is a stable oil that can\nwithstand high temperature cooking.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Coconut oil is a source\nof&nbsp; short-chain fatty acids&nbsp; which are easier to digest than long-chain\nacids of other cooking vegetable oils. &nbsp;Short-chain\nfatty acids help to strengthen and develop cell membranes while long-chain\nacids of oils of Canola, Olive, Sunflower etc increase risks of blood clots and\ncancer.&nbsp; &nbsp;Our bodies metabolize short-chain fats\ndifferently than long-chain ones. The &nbsp;short-chain fats of fresh coconut oil are NOT\nassociated with cardiovascular problems in the same way as the long-chain ones\nare.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Health benefits of &nbsp;coconut oil-</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Fights infections due\nto the lauric acid content</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What makes coconut oil\nso different from other saturated fats?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It's all about the\nmolecular structure. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All fats are made\nof fatty acids which are made up of long carbon chains with hydrogen atoms\nattached. &nbsp;Different types of fats can be\nclassified by their level of \u201csaturation\u201d of hydrogen. &nbsp;A saturated fat has no possibility to attract\nmore hydrogen atoms and is therefore very stable. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A polyunsaturated fat has many free spaces for\nhydrogen atoms and is therefore reactive and not a stable structure and a\nmonounsaturated fat has only one available space for hydrogen, making it\nrelatively stable. &nbsp;Coconut oil is a\nsaturated fat, which can be safely heated to high temperatures.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-H2jBfPj9-Mk/UU_v8TX4klI/AAAAAAAAg6M/hRYwZvSWca4/s1600/fat-composition.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"312\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-H2jBfPj9-Mk/UU_v8TX4klI/AAAAAAAAg6M/hRYwZvSWca4/s400/fat-composition.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike\nsaturated fats from animal sources, coconut oil does not raise cholesterol\nlevels in the body or contribute to cardiovascular disease. In fact, it does\nthe opposite. It can effectively lower LDL cholesterol and has a protective\neffect on the arteries.&nbsp; It does this\nbecause of the size of its molecule.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are short chain\nfatty acids (SCFAs), medium chain fatty acids (MCFAs) or long chain fatty acids\n(LCFAs). The size of the fatty acid is extremely important as the body\nmetabolizes the fatty acids differently according to their size. &nbsp;Coconut oil is comprised of &nbsp;SCFAs and MCFAs.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It's the long chain fatty\nacids that lead to weight gain, raised cholesterol levels, &nbsp;atherosclerosis, &nbsp;cardiovascular disease and put a strain on the\nliver, pancreas and digestive tract. &nbsp;Short and Medium chain fatty acids on the\nother hand lower the risk of these conditions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The long chain fatty\nacids are also known as long chain triglycerides (LCTs) and the body needs\nto&nbsp; package them with carrier proteins\nrequiring special enzymes to effectively metabolize them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The\nmedium chain triglycerides (MCTs) found in coconut oil are smaller and can\neasily cross cell membranes without the need for the special enzymes or carrier\nproteins. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MCTs go straight to the liver\nwhere they are converted to energy that the body can use rather than being\nstored as fat. The MCTs don't even need bile or pancreatic enzymes to be used\nby the body and are therefore perfect for those who have no gallbladder.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Coconut oil, like\nmother's milk, is rich in lauric acid.
