padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7104499870589015815\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_30M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/12012375046903114096\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Ramkumar Jayaraman</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1538714115171#c7104499870589015815\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 5, 2018 at 10:05 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_30MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nIs it out of the desire to have a separate ruling territory and history the Pandiyas brought this language and culture out of the Danava civilization? Otherwise how can there be similarities between Malayalam and Tamil. Later wherever the Danava script was found the white historian and stooges labeled them as Tamil for divide and rule and subvert the oldest Danava civilization. If all the ancient links were made to Tamil the history cannot go beyond 500BC but if made to the Danava then they will have to accept that Danavas are the fountain head...</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_30BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_30B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_31B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7730451396228254264\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_31M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1538717508422#c7730451396228254264\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 5, 2018 at 11:01 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_31MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCHERAS WERE IN KERALA .<br />\n<br />\nCHOLAS WERE NORTH OF TAMIL NADU<br />\n<br />\nPANDYAS WERE SOUTH OF TAMIL NADU AND INCLUDED SRI LANKA<br />\n<br />\nANCIENT SRI LANKA ( NORTH ) WAS INFESTED THE MALAYALIS ..<br />\n<br />\nDURING BRITISH RULE MALAYALIS CAME RUNNING BACK TO KERALA, AS THE BRITISH WERE TREATING THEM LIKE ANIMALS IN THEIR PLANTATIONS..THEIR DESCENDANTS HAVE MIXED BLOOD WITH TRIBALS FROM MOUNTAIN RANGE ( MALAYYARS ) ARE THE EZHAVAS WITH BLUNT FACIAL FEATURES.<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILDs HISTORIANS DELETED THE DANAVA CIVILZATION LIKE HOW HE DELETED NIKOLA TESLA..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHY THEY CONVERTED THE OLDEST UNIVERISTY OF THE PLANET FROM WHERE ARYANS ( NAMOODIRI PROFESSORS ) WENT ALL OVER AS VISITING PROFESSORS --TO A WHORE HOUSE<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/03/kodungallur-bharani-festival-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\nTHE DESECRATION IF KODUNGALLUR TEMPLE BY TAMIL DALITS ( KANNAGI PARTY ) IS INAUGURATED BY THE CRYPTO JEW VARMA RULER OF KODUNGALLUR..<br />\n<br />\nJEWS HAD A REASON TO HIDE THE FACT THAT NAMBOODIRI ELDER BROTHERS WERE THE ARYANS AND DISGRACED NAMBOODIRI YOUNGER BROTHER WERE THE SEMITES..<br />\n<br />\nARYABHATTA WAS A NAMBOODIRI .. HIS NAME WAS ARYAN BHATTATHIRIPAD-- WHO ARE THE MATH EXPERT CREAM OF NAMBOODIRIS.. NAMBOODIRIS ARE SANSKRIT / ORAL VEDAS KNOWING CREAM OF RULERS THIYYAS ..<br />\n<br />\nTHIYYAS WERE THE ORIGINAL AYURVEDIC EXPERTS PROFICIENT IN SURGERY-- AND THEY WERE NAVIGATORS WHO SAILED RIGHT UP TO CRETE ( GREECE ) AND CARTHAGE ( MODERN TUNISIA ).<br />\n<br />\nSURGEON SUSRUTA WAS A THIYYA FROM KERALA .. PHYSICIAN CHARAKA WAS A NAMBOODIRI WERE KEPT AWAY FROM BLOOD AND GORE..<br />\n<br />\nKALARI EXPERTS WERE ALL THIYYAS..<br />\n<br />\nMAPPILAS OF KERALA WERE ALL HINDU THIYYAS.&nbsp; &nbsp;BEFORE THE ADVENT OF ISLAM..THEY WERE IN CHARGE OF THE SPICES WHILE ON OVERLAND ROUTE TILL PALESTINE AND GEORGIA.<br />\n<br />\nFOREIGNERS CAME TO ANCIENT INDIA VIA KERALA SHIPS..<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS IMPOSSIBLE TO ENTER VIA BOLAN AND KHYBER PASS OF HINDU KHUSH MOUNTAINS , UNLESS YOU HAD INDIAN CONTACTS WHO INVITED YOU AND PROVIDED GUIDES.<br />\n<br />\nLATER THE BOLAN/ KHYBER PASS WERE CONTROLLED BY CRYPTO JEW AFRIDIS AND KHANS --WHO WERE IN THE PAYROLL OF JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD CONTROLLED INDIA-- HE MONOPOLIZED SHIPPING AND THE BOLAN/ KHYBER PASS.<br />\n<br />\n80% OF THE MOGHUL EMPERORS WERE CRYPTO JEWS..<br />\n<br />\n70% OF THE TURKISH SULTANS OF THE OTTOMAN EMPIRE WERE CRYPTO JEWS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE KHILAFAT MOVEMENT WAS ALL ABOUT CRYPTO JEW GANDHI RUNNING INTO KERALA WITH CRYPTO JEW MOHAMMAD ALI JAUHAR TO WHIP UP PASSIONS FOR A CRYPTO JEW OTTOMAN TURKISH SULTAN.. AND FINALLY CRYPTO JEW MUSTAFA KEMAL ATTATURK TOOK OVER TURKEY..<br />\n<br />\nMAJJA HAI--KISSI KOH KUCH NAHIN POTHA-- NAY--PATHA..<br />\n<br />\nISRAEL IS DESPERATELY TRYING TO PLACE A CRYPTO JEW RULER IN SYRIA AND IRAN..<br />\n<br />\nREST ALL OIL RICH KINGDOMS AROUND ISRAEL ARE RULED BY CRYPTO JEWS ..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_32b+seedOcrD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fwWB8iHLUHc/UU6HW6C8xEI/AAAAAAAAg3o/wtvAagDyVK8/s1600/VADAKAYIL+4.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fwWB8iHLUHc/UU6HW6C8xEI/AAAAAAAAg3o/wtvAagDyVK8/s1600/VADAKAYIL+4.JPG\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n..</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt.
